Konflik berlaku apabila penjenayah tersilap menculik orang yang menyebabkan Faridah dan Hisham perlu melakukan sesuatu untuk menyelamatkan Azura.

programme.title: Pak Tam Duda
programme.desc: seorang duda dan usahawan yang berjaya di dalam kampungnya . Dia juga dihormati oleh orang-orang kampung kerana kebaikan dan kemurahan hatinya . muncul seorang gadis bandar serta teman lelakinya yang mempunyai niat jahat untuk menggoda dan mengikis segala wang dan harta lelaki itu.

programme.title: Pertentangan
programme.desc: keharmonian sebuah rumah tangga diragut setelah ketua keluarga dinaikkan pangkat dan hanyut dengan nikmat dunia

programme.title: All You Need Id Pag-Ibig
programme.desc: Sekumpulan individu yang penuh cinta, masing-masing berjuang dengan apa yang mereka inginkan daripada hubungan romantis.

programme.title: Tmo Hanya Kau Yang Satu
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Hanya Kau Yang Satu

programme.title: Janin Tak Berdosa
programme.desc: pasangan suami isteri muda Firman dan Julia merancang berbulan madu di Amsterdam selepas Firman mendapat kenaikan pangkat di syarikatnya. Oleh kerana pada masa itu Julia mengandung dan beliau ingin meneruskan percutiannya maka mereka merancang menggugurkan kandungan itu.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep12
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Sampai Syurga
programme.desc: Sulaiman yang sentiasa bersikap romantik terhadap isterinya, Azizah kerana beliau percaya kasih sayang perlu ditunjukkan sesama pasangan walaupun sudah berusia.

programme.title: Kidnap
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki berjanji dengan teman wanitanya bahawa dia akan bersamanya pada hari lahirnya iaitu dua hari kemudian. Kemudian pada petang itu semasa berhenti untuk minum di sebuah bar, dia tersilap diculik kerana menyerupai anak seorang jutawan.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep4
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Tiada Tajuk
programme.desc: tiga orang pemuda kampung yang ingin menjadi penyanyi rock dan pop terkenal. Mereka berimpian besar tetapi tidak dihargai di kampung mereka. Pelbagai cabaran dan dugaan perlu mereka hadapi demi mencapai impian.

programme.title: Tmo Milik Siapa Syurga Itu
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Milik Siapa Syurga Itu

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep13
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Jiran
programme.desc: seorang lelaki membawa keluarganya berpindah rumah di sebuah taman perumahan . Kehadiran mereka di situ tidak dikenali oleh orang-orang yang berada disekelilingnya kerana sikap sombong dan mementingkan diri . Lelaki tersebut bukan sahaja tidak mengambil tahu hal jirannya malah melarang isteri dan anaknya bergaul dengan mereka

programme.title: Mempelai Panda
programme.desc: mengisahkan tentang Borhan atau Boobear yang merupakan seorang pelawak upahan berpakaian panda yang bekerja keras untuk mengumpul duit. Ianya bertujuan sebagai wang hantaran untuk mengahwini Zara. Ini kerana maknya telah menetapkan wang hantaran sebanyak RM20k untuk mengahwini anaknya.

programme.title: Jeritan Batinku
programme.desc: kepayahan hidup dilalui seorang remaja perempuan malang yang sering didera secara kejam, setelah kehilangan kasih seorang ayah dan ibu kandungnya.

programme.title: Jom Wayang S14 Ep16
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep4
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Putar Alam
programme.desc: kegiatan jenayah yang dilakukan oleh seorang pemuda bersama rakan-rakannya untuk menjadi cepat kaya. Melalui perniagaan salun rambut mereka menipu pelanggan dalam berbagai cara untuk mendapatkan wang.

programme.title: Cinta Kita
programme.desc: seorang gadis yang keciwa dalam percintaan alu mengubah wataknya menjadi seorang “tomboy” .Namun dia kembali kepada wanita semula setelah menemui cinta yang baru

programme.title: Sampai Syurga
programme.desc: Sulaiman yang sentiasa bersikap romantik terhadap isterinya, Azizah kerana beliau percaya kasih sayang perlu ditunjukkan sesama pasangan walaupun sudah berusia.

programme.title: Tmo Milik Siapa Syurga Itu
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Milik Siapa Syurga Itu

programme.title: Sherry Anne
programme.desc: kes pembunuhan seorang gadis remaja jelita. Siasatan yang lembab, penyalahgunaan kuasa dan rasuah telah menyebabkan empat suspek yang tidak bersalah teraniaya, disabit dan dihukum penjara atas pertuduhan palsu dalam kes pembunuhan ini.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep13
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Next Station Jodoh
programme.desc: Berkisar sepasang kekasih yang telah berpisah selama lima tahun bertemu semula dalam keadaan yang tidak dijangka di sebuah stesen keretapi. Pertemuan itu memberi peluang kepada mereka menceritakan kisah sebenar akan sebab berlakunya perpisahan tersebut akibat orang ketiga yang turut bersaing dalam merebut cinta antara mereka.

programme.title: Motif
programme.desc: Dewi seorang polis penyiasat telah terlibat dalam satu kes penculikan di luar bandar.dalam pada masa yang sama dewi bergelut dengan perasaan sebagai isteri kedua.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep5
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Kasih Farrah
programme.desc: isu dendam oleh seorang lelaki dengan seorang wanita yang berlaku lebih 25 tahun dahulu, secara tidak sengaja lelaki itu pula bercinta dengan anak perempuan bekas kekasihnya sewaktu mereka berdua menuntut di luar negara.

programme.title: Tmo Playboy Kantoi
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Playboy Kantoi

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep1
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Serampang Tiga
programme.desc: seorang lelaki yang ditugaskan untuk menentang penjenayah yang bermaharajalela dan bertindak zalim terhadap penduduk kampung . Pengembaraan tersebut dilalui dengan pelbagai cabaran dan dugaan . Lelaki tersebut bukan sahaja terpaksa berhadapan dengan penjenayah malah pemimpin yang menyalahgunakan kuasa dalam menjalankan tugas yang diamanahkan

programme.title: Misteri Bisikan Pontianak
programme.desc: Seorang wanita menerima seutas rantai kepunyaan adiknya dari seorang nenek. Rantai itu diterima selepas kejadian pembunuhan cucu nenek tersebut. Wanita yang bijak itu percaya adiknya besar kemungkinan adalah suspek dalam pembunuhah lalu merancang beberapa kejadian aneh/menakutkan sehingga adiknya mengaku membunuh cucu nenek itu.

programme.title: All You Need Id Pag-Ibig
programme.desc: Sekumpulan individu yang penuh cinta, masing-masing berjuang dengan apa yang mereka inginkan daripada hubungan romantis.

programme.title: Jom Wayang S14 Ep17
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep5
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Mat Kari Mek Tomyam
programme.desc: Wanda seorang gadis kampung yang datang ke Kuala Lumpur untuk bekerja di sebuah Café milik makciknya, telah bertemu dengan seorang jejaka yang gila dengan masakan Kari dan Wanda seorang yang hanya pandai memasak Tom Yam yang akhirnya menjadi satu cinta. Pelbagai dugaan dan telatah mereka berdua yang ditempuh semasa mengenali antara satu sama lain.

programme.title: Merah
programme.desc: Tiga sahabat ini pada asalnya berkiblatkan pada kebenaran dan kesucian, tetapi atas cabaran suratan nasib, mereka berubah mengambil jalan singkat untuk mengubah hidup mereka . Mereka bertiga melakukan satu rompakan nekad untuk membantu nenek salleh yang terlantar di hospital, yang memerlukan wang yang banyak untuk mendapatkan rawatan pakar

programme.title: Next Station Jodoh
programme.desc: Berkisar sepasang kekasih yang telah berpisah selama lima tahun bertemu semula dalam keadaan yang tidak dijangka di sebuah stesen keretapi. Pertemuan itu memberi peluang kepada mereka menceritakan kisah sebenar akan sebab berlakunya perpisahan tersebut akibat orang ketiga yang turut bersaing dalam merebut cinta antara mereka.

programme.title: Tmo Playboy Kantoi
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Playboy Kantoi

programme.title: Born To Be Yai
programme.desc: Sejak zaman kanak-kanak dari Pijit yang terpaksa berhenti belajar di darjah 6 kerana kemiskinan keluarganya, Chai bergelut dengan pelbagai pekerjaan. Dia gagal dan bermula semula berkali-kali, tetapi tidak pernah berputus asa. Titik perubahan dalam hidupnya datang apabila dia diperkenalkan dengan dunia perniagaan jualan langsung.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep1
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Blood For Freedom
programme.desc: Semasa perang menentang komunis, seorang askar Thai mempertaruhkan nyawanya untuk menyelamatkan seorang budak lelaki Hmong dari sebuah perkampungan yang terbakar di utara. Budak itu membesar menjadi Kapten Songkiat, seorang askar yang berjanji setia kepada negara Thai.

programme.title: Jiran
programme.desc: seorang lelaki membawa keluarganya berpindah rumah di sebuah taman perumahan . Kehadiran mereka di situ tidak dikenali oleh orang-orang yang berada disekelilingnya kerana sikap sombong dan mementingkan diri . Lelaki tersebut bukan sahaja tidak mengambil tahu hal jirannya malah melarang isteri dan anaknya bergaul dengan mereka

programme.title: Jatuh Bangun Penjual Bandrek Keliling Untuk Merawat Ibunya
programme.desc: Selepas bapanya meninggal dunia, Adit membantu ibunya menyara kehidupan. Adit dan ibunya tidak mendapat harta pusaka kerana ditipu. Namun begitu, Adit meneruskan usahanya untuk menjual bandrek (minuman tradisional Sunda).

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep8
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Bintang Pantura 6 Ep69
programme.desc: Bintang Pantura 6 kini kembali! Juragan Soimah ditemani oleh Nunung (Pembantu Juragan) dan Inul Daratista (Rakan Perniagaan Juragan) akan mencari 40 peserta untuk bertanding di pentas impian. Bersama mentor: Nassar, Via Vallen, Dewi Perssik, Jenita Janet, Happy Asmara dan para Konco Pantura.

programme.title: Dua Dunia Salma Ep9
programme.desc: Seorang gadis cantik dan ceria yang menjadi tulang belakang keluarga sejak ibunya meninggal dunia. Manakala ayahnya seorang kaki minum – alcohol dan bermain judi. Namun Salma akhirnya mendapat pekerjaan sebagai pekerja syarikat dengan gaji yang lumayan. Bagaimanakah kisah selanjutnya?

programme.title: Jangan Panggil Gue Pak Haji Ep46
programme.desc: Babe Markum adalah pemilik restoran yang rendah hati dan hidangannya terkenal di kawasan sekitar. Semua jiran dan pelanggan selalu memanggilnya "Pak Haji" walaupun dia tidak pernah mengunjungi ke tanah suci. Impiannya adalah untuk pergi ke kota-kota Islam yang suci dan merealisasikan nama panggilannya suatu hari nanti.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep52
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Kakek Penjual Pakan Ternak Yang Berhasil Jadi Peternakan Sukses
programme.desc: Pak Aji bekerja sebagai kuli. Dalam perjalanan pulang, dia bertemu dengan Silvi, anak yatim piatu yang melarikan diri dari rumah neneknya. Pada suatu hari, Pak Aji berpeluang bekerja sebagai peniaga ternakan dan melalui pelbagai rintangan.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep41
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Duda Ganteng Bikin Kena Mental
programme.desc: Rio yang berstatus duda berebut teksi dengan Marsha yang pada hari itu akan menghadiri temuduga. Namun disebabkan pemandu teksi itu berasa jengkel, akhirnya mereka berdua keluar dari teksi dan teksi itu berlalu pergi tanpa seorang penumpang.

programme.title: BUSER Investigasi Ep7
programme.desc: BUSER atau BUru SERgap Investigasi adalah program berita mengenai jenayah yang telah berlaku di Indonesia.

programme.title: Kakek Penjual Pakan Ternak Yang Berhasil Jadi Peternakan Sukses
programme.desc: Pak Aji bekerja sebagai kuli. Dalam perjalanan pulang, dia bertemu dengan Silvi, anak yatim piatu yang melarikan diri dari rumah neneknya. Pada suatu hari, Pak Aji berpeluang bekerja sebagai peniaga ternakan dan melalui pelbagai rintangan.

programme.title: Tourguide Setengah Cinta
programme.desc: Tertekan dengan pekerjaan di Jakarta, Monic memilih untuk menenangkan fikiran dengan bercuti ke kampung. Tetapi ternyata pemandu pelancongnya adalah Andra. Kenapa tourguide ini selekeh?

programme.title: Sakitnya Hatiku Tak Pernah Mendapat Cinta Suami
programme.desc: Keluarga Arum dan Rangga telah berkawan selama beberapa dekad, ayah Arum ingin menjodohkannya dengan Rangga tetapi Rangga mempunyai teman wanita.

programme.desc: Untuk mengelak daripada berkahwin dengan pemiutang ayahnya, Maya terpaksa bekerja keras di penternakan udang ayahnya untuk membayar hutang ayahnya. Bagaimanapun, masalah berlaku apabila ayahnya memberitahu bahawa kebanyakan udang di kolam itu telah mati. Setibanya Bagas di kolam, Maya memaksanya membantunya supaya dia dapat melunaskan hutang ayahnya dengan cepat.

programme.title: Battle Of Jangsari
programme.desc: A task force commander leads 772 student soldiers to flank the North Korean army and eliminate their supply line at Jangsari beach, in order to turn the tide of war in favor of South Korea.

programme.title: A Tiger In Winter
programme.desc: On a winter day, a man is kicked out of his girlfriend's apartment. He then begins a job as a substitute driver at night. One night, he meets his ex-girlfriend who now works as a novelist.

programme.title: Bluebeard
programme.desc: A sedated patient confesses to his doctor that he and his son are both involved in an unsolved serial murder case.

programme.title: The Neighbors
programme.desc: A young girl was murdered and resident of the building suspects the killer lives among them. The battle against this murderous neighbor begins.

programme.title: Set Me Free
programme.desc: Being abandoned in a group home since young, Young-Jae now struggles to make a living as he's too old to live there anymore.

programme.title: By Quantum Physics: A Nightlife Venture
programme.desc: A nightclub owner, his club manager and a police officer must wash their hands off a drug abuse case that involves high-profile figures, in order to save their own lives.

programme.title: Mission: Possible
programme.desc: A cash-strapped private investigator Woo Su-Han is retained by a secret agent Yoo Da-Hee to bring down a high risk arms trafficking operation.

programme.title: Hitman: Agent Jun
programme.desc: While under the influence of alcohol, an unsuccessful comic book writer draws a comic about his life as a former NIS hitman, and runs into trouble when it gets posted online.

programme.title: Unforgettable
programme.desc: A radio DJ receives a letter written 23 years ago in the past. Through the letter, the story of his first love and friendships of five friends are revealed.

programme.title: The Client
programme.desc: Elite attorney Kang Seong-Hee goes up against a top prosecutor over a case involving a man accused of killing his wife.

programme.title: How To Steal A Dog
programme.desc: As the family goes bankrupt, Jiso decided to steal dog from wealthy family and return it for the reward money. Will her plan be successful?

programme.title: Josee
programme.desc: The movie depicts the unforgettable love between Josee, a girl with physical disability and Young-Seok.

programme.title: Juror 8
programme.desc: Based on a true story, eight ordinary people of different backgrounds were selected as the first jury for a murder trial in South Korea in 2008.

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: A once legendary gangster Dong-chul tries to settle down to enjoy an ordinary life with his wife, but things get hard when he continuously gets tricked into making bad business decisions.

programme.title: Cheer Up, Mr Lee!
programme.desc: Unlike his heart-throb appearances, Mr. Lee, who has very child-like characteristics, embarks on a voyage of discovery with his young daughter ‘Saet-byeol’ whom he has just met.

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Two Worlds
programme.desc: Having died unexpectedly, firefighter Ja-hong is taken to the afterlife by 3 guardians. To reincarnate, he must pass 7 trials in 49 days to prove that he led an upright life while he was still living.

programme.title: Confession Of Murder
programme.desc: A police officer haunted for failing to capture a serial killer 15 years back, returns to the case after a novelist publishes the book "I am the Murderer", claiming responsibility for the crimes.

programme.title: Rough Cut
programme.desc: When a bad-boy movie star hires a real gangster to take on an opposing role to avoid a scandal after beating a fellow actor half to death, he gets more than he bargained for from this replacement.

programme.title: The Outlaws
programme.desc: In order to maintain peace, a ruthless detective and his ragtag team plan to take down the most feared Chinese gangster in Seoul.

programme.title: Operation Chromite
programme.desc: "Operation Chromite" tells the true story of a General, who led the attack against the North Koreans in the Battle of Incheon, forcing them to retreat out of Seoul.

programme.title: Samjin Company English Class
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in South Korea, three female office co-workers who enroll in English classes in hopes to advance their careers, struggle to expose the corruption inside their company.

programme.title: Master
programme.desc: An intellectual crime investigation team goes after One Network, a company involved in a massive fraud and corruption case in Korea.

programme.title: Secret Zoo
programme.desc: Dreams of landing a permanent position at a top law firm, a lawyer takes on an unusual assignment of keeping an ownerless zoo running by convincing its employees to dress up as animals.

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Two Worlds
programme.desc: Having died unexpectedly, firefighter Ja-hong is taken to the afterlife by 3 guardians. To reincarnate, he must pass 7 trials in 49 days to prove that he led an upright life while he was still living.

programme.title: By Quantum Physics: A Nightlife Venture
programme.desc: A nightclub owner, his club manager and a police officer must wash their hands off a drug abuse case that involves high-profile figures, in order to save their own lives.

programme.title: Will You Be There?
programme.desc: A surgeon’s dying wish is to see his lover who had died in an accident long ago. He receives pills that allow him to travel back in time and tries to save her. There, he also meets his younger self.

programme.title: Mission: Possible
programme.desc: A cash-strapped private investigator Woo Su-Han is retained by a secret agent Yoo Da-Hee to bring down a high risk arms trafficking operation.

programme.title: The Outlaws
programme.desc: In order to maintain peace, a ruthless detective and his ragtag team plan to take down the most feared Chinese gangster in Seoul.

programme.title: A Special Lady
programme.desc: A woman who becomes the second-in-command of a gangster organization-turned-leading business entity, fights against the ruthless world of man's society, to protect her only son.

programme.title: Battle Of Jangsari
programme.desc: A task force commander leads 772 student soldiers to flank the North Korean army and eliminate their supply line at Jangsari beach, in order to turn the tide of war in favor of South Korea.

programme.title: Be With You
programme.desc: Before her death, a woman promises her family that she would return on a rainy day, one year later. Miraculously, she reappears before her husband and son but has no memory about her past.

programme.title: Europe Outside Your Tent Ep5
programme.desc: Enjoy the virtual tour with the 4 actors! They'll go on camping trips in Europe - rental cars instead of trains, campgrounds instead of hotels, and local marts instead of restaurants.

programme.title: House on Wheels 4 Ep5
programme.desc: Enjoy travelling with Sung Dong-il, Kim Hee-won and Rowoon in a tiny, portable home around Korea bringing only essential belongings in the new season of <House on Wheels>!

programme.title: One Night Food Trip- International Edition Ep11
programme.desc: Stay tuned to this spin-off of “One Night Food Trip” toured by Korean and local celebrities and find out the delicacies you can't miss in different Asian countries!

programme.desc: 'Nation's MC' Yoo Jae-suk and Jo Se-ho will chat with celebrities and people from all walks of life, and throw them surprise quizzes!

programme.desc: A romance fantasy drama that tells the story of a fearless producer determined to hunt down a nine-tailed fox who goes after evils that disrupt the order of the human world.

programme.title: Bond with China Ep47
programme.desc: “Bond with China”, which is produced by China Media Group China Central Television International Channel, is a large-scale intercultural communication documentary program.

programme.title: Network News
programme.desc: Network News is a 30min news, news about china and the world.

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep819820
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45014502
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1959
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3505
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep28
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Golden Indie Music Awards(M) Ep1
programme.desc: The Golden Indie Music Awards (Hereinafter the GIMAs) are music awards for original music with music composition at its core, encouraging musicians in Taiwan to show their diverse creativity. The awards are known for its three features: prioritizing Taiwanese music, prioritizing originality, and separating the categories by genres without considering languages. Since its launch in 2010, the GIMAs have nurtured music creators of all types in Taiwan and is an important international music award that represents the freedom, diversity ,and original creative energy of Taiwanese musicians.

programme.title: Back To Home (M) Ep1415
programme.desc: When the news reached her that the old village leader had passed away, Xiao Li, who was a personal shopper, stuffed a few things into her Hermes bag and, clutching the lucky salt he had once given her, set out for her home town wearing her Prada high-heeled shoes. That night A-Jian, who was helping out in a Japanese restaurant, also jumped on the bus and headed home as soon as he received the news. In his will, the old man divided up his salt fields among the villagers, but on the condition that A-Jian and Xiao Li get married. When they heard this, A-Jian and Xiao Li found themselves immediately surrounded…

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1025

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) (Repeat) Ep114
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep768769
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep645
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep423
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Piggy's Counter-Attack (M) Ep5253
programme.desc: A rich father, who built his fortune from nothing, goes bankrupt overnight when his investments fail. His children are knocked out of heaven and have to launch a counterattack.

programme.title: Secret Diary of a Mom To Be, The
programme.desc: A high-flying PR manager and her loving husband swear by a childless lifestyle but she is shocked to learn that she is expecting just when things look bright for a promotion! How would they deal with the unexpected surprises that life throws in their way?

programme.title: Legend of the Demon Cat
programme.desc: Adapted from a Japanese fantasy novel, a demon cat appears and breaks the peace of Chang'an city, causing a series of mysterious events. A poet and a Japanese monk band together to follow the trails left by the cat, leading them to discover a buried secret.

programme.title: The Way We Are
programme.desc: Set in Tin Shui Wai, a marginalised satellite town, Kwai is a middle-aged widow who works hard in a neighbourhood supermarket to support herself and her son. They lead a mundane but fulfilling life. When an elderly woman who lives alone moved in to Tin Shui Wai, Kwai strikes up a friendship with her and helps her ease into a new life.

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, police officer Zhang relentlessly hunts them down and accidentally finds himself implicated in a major child abduction case. In the process, he teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the international crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: Running On Karma
programme.desc: Andy Lau is a monk turned body-builder, with the gift of foreseeing people's lives. He befriends a female cop (Cecilia Cheung) and uses his gift to change the force of Karma and her destiny. The movie is ultimately a Buddhist parable about the nature of karma.

programme.title: The Macaque Monkey
programme.desc: The world is in chaos after the tree of life was burnt. Sun Wu Kong decides to return to the past to resurrect it, but his divine power is unstable after losing the golden hoop, and he must find his younger self to team up to find the power of time. As the six-eared Macaque Monkey also wants the power of time, they clash in a fierce battle…

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: In this dark-comedy, cop-turned-security guard Ma faces the ultimate challenge when his boss mysteriously disappears and his paralyzed sister makes a morbid deal with the armed bandits who abduct her.

programme.title: Love is Cold
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in Macau, a teenage boy and girl kill someone and clean up the crime scene together. The girl is from China and is bullied in her new school. The boy is from a complicated family who has close ties to the gangster world. They are instantly attracted to each other when they met but who did they kill and will they get away with it?

programme.title: Colour of the Game
programme.desc: Wallace, an old gang member, is tasked to kill the son of a mob boss, Robert. Gathering his team for the job, the six of them set out to hunt Robert down. However, when the mission goes horribly wrong, Wallace later finds out that it was all a set-up to flush out a mole in his team…

programme.title: One Second
programme.desc: Directed by renowned director Zhang Yimou, the film is set during the Cultural Revolution, where a common man escapes a labour camp to find a newsreel that captures his daughter for one second in a movie. On the way, he encounters an orphan who also seeks the movie reel. Can the man finally pass the reel to a projectionist and screen the movie?

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Henry Chen, a former soldier, is recruited for his toughest mission yet - teaching a class of teen delinquents. As he kicks his way into their school and home lives, it becomes clear that his unconventional teaching style might be just what they need.

programme.title: Running On Karma
programme.desc: Andy Lau is a monk turned body-builder, with the gift of foreseeing people's lives. He befriends a female cop (Cecilia Cheung) and uses his gift to change the force of Karma and her destiny. The movie is ultimately a Buddhist parable about the nature of karma.

programme.title: Deception of the Novelist
programme.desc: This is a sexy thriller adapted from the hit story by the famous internet author, Xxharuki. A self-help book author Xu lives happily with his wife Jeana and their son. However, when a voluptuous and seductive tenant rents their apartment upstairs, Xu’s life is turned upside down.

programme.title: Operation Red Sea
programme.desc: When a terrorist group plots to obtain nuclear materials under the cover of a violent coup in Northern Africa, only the Chinese Navy’s elite, Jiaolong Assault Team, have the deadly skill and precision needed to take on the situation and rescue its citizens.

programme.title: Paws-Men
programme.desc: When a dog is in need of rescue, the Paws-Men assemble to save the dog like Batman. “Paws-Men” tells the story of four men rescuing dogs and the many difficulties that they encounter, from a dog eatery to bullies and a dog abusing granny. Despite the hardships, Paws-Men give us a peek into the true friendships between dogs and humans.

programme.title: Ashes of Time Redux
programme.desc: After his beloved woman married his brother, Ou Yang Feng moves to the desert to run an inn and becomes a killer agent. He makes acquaintance of different people with their different stories ... The movie is the winner of the 1st Hong Kong Film Critics Society Awards for Best Film, Best Director, Best Screenplay and Best Actor (Leslie Cheung).

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: A single-parent family (Yu Xiang and Tong Tong) move into a new neighbourhood where everyone’s life seems perfect. However, while things may look rosy on the outside, dark secrets and horror raid each family from the inside, and nothing really are as they seem.

programme.title: Driving Miss Wealthy
programme.desc: To teach his irresponsible daughter Jennifer some respect, her billionaire father pretends to disown her. He then hires Mario to pretend to be her driver and protect her. Just as the two start falling for each other, Jennifer’s father becomes very ill and she must take over his business. Will Jennifer and Mario’s budding romance continue?

programme.title: Kowloon Walled City
programme.desc: Neng was a street fighter in Northeast China but decides to start a new life in Hong Kong’s Kowloon Walled City. Unfortunately, he is implicated in the fights and conspiracies among the triad forces. When his good friend is hunted down by the triad, Neng must team up with the residents of Kowloon Walled City to fight back and save his friend.

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: Based on the true story of David Ki, one of Asia’s top rock climbers who lost everything when a motorcycle accident crippled him. Rather than succumbing to his fate, David found a way of scaling the dizzying peaks again by becoming a wheelchair-bound athlete and soon reached the peak of Lion Rock!

programme.title: Running Out Of Time
programme.desc: When a cancer-ridden criminal sets out to seek vengeance on Hong Kong's organized crime syndicates, police inspector and excellent hostage negotiator Ho Sheung Sang finds himself pulled into a 72-hour battle of wits and courage.

programme.title: Hong Kong Playboys
programme.desc: Sheng is a rich playboy who lives a carefree and fun life with the ladies, until his mother decides that he should get married. Up against other lady killers in his quest to find Miss Right, Sheng must decide what he wants.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Chang’s first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunt’s puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: In the beginning of 1997, Hong Kong's three notorious thieves who have never met one another before appear in the same restaurant. This leads to a rumour that they are joining forces to pull off something big before the Handover, though this is not something that any of them is aware of.

programme.title: Cliff Walkers
programme.desc: The first spy thriller movie by famous Director Zhang Yi Mou, this film follows four Communist Party special agents who embark on a secret operation in the Japanese puppet state of Manchukuo in 1932. Sold out by a traitor, the agents, who split up into two teams, find themselves surrounded by threats on all sides. Can they complete their mission?

programme.title: Maoshan Heavenly Master
programme.desc: Prisoner Chi flees away under Master Zhang’s custody, causing the latter to be expelled from his clan. On his way to find Chi, Master Zhang arrives at a place where many people vanish for no reason. He soon discovers that it is Chi who captures them to become a serpent demon. The war between human and demon has just begun!

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kong’s toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: A Hong Kong police inspector, Lin Dong, had to protect an important witness in his mission thirteen years ago. This not only forced him to be separated from his daughter, but also got him involved in a conspiracy spanning more than a decade.

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kong’s Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: The Kiss Addict
programme.desc: One night after a performance, a young, talented violinist Wen Feng receives a kiss from a mysterious woman Duo La in Yalazhen. After that he begins his addiction to kissing. To find out the reason behind this mysterious new addiction, he goes back to Tibet in search of Duo La and ends up uncovering a mystery far beyond his comprehension…

programme.title: Nightfall
programme.desc: Detective George Lam investigates the brutal death of a Sino-British conductor and suspects he is murdered by Wong Yuen Yeung, a dumb killer who has just been released from prison. When out on a manhunt for Wong, Lam finds more revelations to the contrary and has to pursue every possibility, taking him deep into Wong’s past.

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his family’s massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: Duel Of Fist
programme.desc: Fan Ke discovers at his father’s deathbed that he has a half-brother, Wenlie, in Thailand. He goes to find Wenlie, who became a boxer to support his sick mother. When the two meet, they are entangled in the underworld of boxing gambling.

programme.title: Hex after Hex
programme.desc: Hell may have no fury like a woman scorned, but hell literally, really has no wrath like a lusting ghost scorned! Cult classic director Kuei Chih-hung shoots the works with this amazing horror romance starring muscular "Venom" Lo Meng.

programme.title: Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Wei Chun is a cocky young man sentenced to jail for killing a man in a fight. One day, Wei Chun picks a fight with a seemingly defenseless old man who completely thrashes him! The old man turns out to be the master of monkey style kung fu and as they become friends, he gives Wei Chun half of a medallion that would direct him to hidden secrets.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return…

programme.title: The Savage Five
programme.desc: A group of bandits flees with a stolen safe to a village where they oppress the villagers and force the blacksmith Wei to unlock the safe. Wei refuses and flees to report to officials, while heroes of the town emerge to fight the bandits.

programme.title: The Female Prince
programme.desc: Hsiao's stepmother frames her fiancé Lung when he refuses to forfeit their engagement and sends him to prison. To save him, Hsiao disguises as Lung to take the Imperial exam and ranks first place. Impressed by Hsiao, the Emperor weds the Princess to 'him'. When Hsiao comes clean on their wedding night, she persuades the Princess to follow a plan…

programme.title: Five Shaolin Masters
programme.desc: The Qing court plots to kill all the disciples by burning down Shaolin Temple. This sudden fire killed almost everyone in the temple except five Shaolin disciples. To take revenge on the Qing’s, the five of them train hard in different fighting styles to become “The Five Shaolin Masters”.

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: Mission Impossible
programme.desc: A sword master’s daughter is pursued and poisoned by an evil master when bringing back the stolen Golden Sword to the palace. She dies on the run and returns as a spirit to take revenge by killing the evil master, and soon vanishes after returning the sword to the emperor.

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: The Anonymous Heroes
programme.desc: Two young men join a rebel group after the Chinese Revolution of 1911 and become patriotic heroes accidentally. Assisted by a warlord’s daughter, they successfully help the rebels steal weapons from the warlord in this action comedy.

programme.title: Heaven and Hell
programme.desc: When an angel, Ling, decides to help his two friends who have fallen in love to escape from Heaven, he is sent to live as a human on earth as his punishment. Reincarnated as a cab driver, he sacrifices his own life to save another ill-fated couple and lands in hell, where he has to face off against the ghosts and demons to fight his way out!

programme.title: Sweet And Wild
programme.desc: Fang is a spunky young village girl who is not afraid to fight back against hooligans. She gets into trouble with the biggest hoodlum Tong when she foils his plans with a maid, causing Tong to plot a revenge. Luckily a man whom she is attracted to, Hai, comes in time to her rescue. Can they fight back?

programme.title: Chinatown Kid
programme.desc: After getting into trouble with a local gangster, Chui Ho, a young man, Tam Dong flees to San Francisco and managed to get a job in a restaurant in Chinatown. Tam Dong finds himself embroiled with the gang again while in San Francisco, and has to fight Chui Ho when the two meet again...

programme.title: Sunset
programme.desc: Teenage heart-throbs Ching Li and Paul Chin Pei come across like Annette Funicello and Frankie Avalon in the musical Sunset, a musical romp that plays similar to one of Hollywood's famous "Beach Party" movies. A car load of girls meets a car load of boys, and Ching and Paul ultimately fall in love. Yet the film takes an acrid twist and turns out to be more like a Shakespearian tragedy than a beach-babe party.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy “House of 72 tenants”, this sequel tells the stories of the tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer money while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: The story follows Monk Tang San Zang’s (Ho Fan) journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey (Yueh Hua), Pigsy (Peng Peng) and Sha Wu Jing (Tien Shun).

programme.title: The Swordmates
programme.desc: Li asks his swordmate Wang to protect his family while he is away, but Wang rapes his wife and even has his convoy attacked. Li escaped but fears his daughter is still in danger, so he asks the nephew of his master to help protect her…

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: The Heroic Ones
programme.desc: The story is set in the Tang Dynasty and David Chiang plays the 13th Prince, a powerful fighter whose prestigious status provokes jealously, leading to a gruesome family feud.

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: The Iron Buddha
programme.desc: After a notorious rapist Xiao kills his master and the entire clan, Han the last surviving disciple, decides to take revenge. He must find the legendary Hulong Blade to counter Xiao's Evil Poisonous Sword, but as Han has never seen Xiao before, he is deceived when Xiao poses as an ally to try and steal his Blade in the process.

programme.title: Hex
programme.desc: Constantly being abused by her cruel husband, the frail Chan Sau Ying awaits death from tuberculosis. The new servant girl Yi Wah, takes pity on her mistress’ plight and the pair proceed to drown him one evening. They dump his body in a nearby pond but Sau Ying believes that the man’s bloated corpse has risen from the bog to seek vengeance.

programme.title: Descendant of the Sun
programme.desc: Shi Sheng is adopted by an old carpenter and grows up to possess extraordinary superpowers. One day, he unexpectedly discovers his identity as the son of the solar deity and learns that his power will be lost during solar eclipse. When an evil spirit appears and wreaks havoc, Shi Sheng must beat him in an ultimate duel to save the world.

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers’ claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: The Villains
programme.desc: Hung is an orphan seeking help from her wealthy uncle who has two sons but only dotes on the younger son Feng, a playboy. Feng covets the beauty of Hung and rapes her but when she gets pregnant, Hung is wrongfully accused and gets sent off by her uncle to protect Feng. Will Feng be punished for his villainy?

programme.title: The Proud Youth
programme.desc: Ling Hu Chong, a Huashan clan’s disciple, is assigned to find the successor to the score “The Proud One”. Ling identifies Ying for the score but finds out that she is the daughter of the evil clan’s leader. At the same time, he is unwittingly dragged into an epic power struggle between clans, with complicated allegiances and perplexing moralities.

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu takes on the glitzy world of nightclub performers in The Yellow Muffler. The film depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching-ping (Irene Chen I-ling) and Pai-hung (Betty Ting Pei) and ends when they are cast in a new movie.

programme.title: Notorious Eight
programme.desc: The young Chen Chi-chin (Liu Yung) loses heavily to experienced gambler Hu Kuan-ten (Lo Lieh). His father loses at cards and dies of shock. Chen appeals to his uncle who summons seven fellow professional gamblers to carry out vengeance. Much more than a gambling film, this is a thrilling melting pot of martial arts stars, extortion, illicit love, poker-face vengeance, and all sorts of edge-of-your-seat gambling duels. Featuring two of the leading action stars of the era, Chen Kuen-tai and Lo Lieh, in a series of intense poker game standoffs. Famed director of the genre, Wong Jing, also has a guest appearance as one of the Notorious Eight.

programme.title: Pale Passion
programme.desc: Fa is an obsessive man who loves his wife Ah Hsia but is easily jealous and abuses her. When she leaves him one day, Fa hooks up with another woman, Hsing. A deadly triangle develops when Fa runs into Ah Hsia again and decides to win her back…

programme.title: Danger has Two Faces
programme.desc: Many years ago, Inspector Kam killed an innocent man and decided to resign from the police force. He became a professional killer who disguises as a pet store owner. When his best friend, Bobby begins investigating recent murder cases committed by Kam, he discovers that the mastermind behind these cases is actually his superintendent.

programme.title: Let's Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung is the son of an entrepreneur of a big corporation. Lian Lian is the niece of a Kindergarten’s principal. Fate has brought them together as Da Yung loses his wallet by mistake when they first met. Further misunderstanding occurs when Da Yung tries to use Lian Lian as an excuse to drive the two women he does not love away.

programme.title: Shaolin Intruders
programme.desc: A rare directorial foray for acclaimed martial arts choreographer Tang Chia, Shaolin Intruders is an entertaining amalgamation of eye-popping martial arts and thrilling detective story. On a routine courier mission, the prestigious Chin Hu Chief was murdered by four mysterious monks. When all evidence pointed to Ching Hua (Liu Yu-po) his friend Lei Hsin (Derek Yee) was determined to clear his name by barging in the Shaolin Temple thrice. When Lei thought justice was served for the culprits, he soon realized the table had turned and the monks stroke again. What followed is a series of intense pursuit for the ultimate villain﹗The film is filled with jaw-dropping action sequences developed by Tang and six leading choreographers of the era. Scenes including the "Blade Array", "Twelve Vajrayana Array" and the acclaimed "Stool Array" are all lauded as the defining Chinese screen gems, for their insane complexity and lightning speed.

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70’s Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sister’s magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.title: All Men are Brothers
programme.desc: This is a sequel to Chang Cheh’s epic “The Water Margin”, and follows the patriotic story of seven warriors in the band of 108 outlaws at Mount Liang. The magnificent seven battle against the despotic government officials to save their country.

programme.title: Saaho
programme.desc: An undercover agent and his partner go after a thief who has stolen 2,000 crore rupees. Soon, they realise that the case is linked to the death of a crime lord and an emerging gang war.

programme.title: Jadaa
programme.desc: Jada, a rising football star, sets aside his ambitions to participate in a violent local tournament to avenge the death of his hero, Sethu.

programme.title: Krack (Ravi Teja)
programme.desc: When three notorious criminals lock horns with a hot-tempered police officer, Potharaju Shankar, little do they know that they will end up behind bars.

programme.title: Maragadha Naanayam
programme.desc: Senguttuvan and Elango are hired by a jewel smuggler to find a cursed treasure responsible for the death of many. Later, with the help of a priest, they summon three spirits to locate the treasure.

programme.title: Akhanda
programme.desc: Balakrishna plays a fierce devotee of Lord Shiva, who stands tall against evildoers.

programme.title: Rummy
programme.desc: College students, Shakthi and Joseph, fall in love with two sisters. When the girls' family learns of their affairs, they are ready to go to any length to save their honour.

programme.title: Greatfather
programme.desc: A businessman who is trying hard to be a good father to his daughter has a run-in with malevolent policeman.

programme.title: Kalathil Santhippom
programme.desc: Ashok and Anand are best friends in spite of being very different. When Ashok accidentally becomes the reason for a misunderstanding in Anand's wedding procedures, he tries to fix it.

programme.title: Dikkilona
programme.desc: When Mani, a lineworker who is unhappy in his marriage, manages to make a time machine work due to an accident, he goes back in time to change his life.

programme.title: Bhaskar Oru Rascal
programme.desc: Bhaskar, a single parent, is labelled rascal because of his impolite behaviour. His son, Akash, decides to set him up with Anu, whose daughter is Akash's classmate.

programme.title: Nenjam Marapadhillai (Sj Suryah)
programme.desc: A god-fearing young woman who takes up the job of a caretaker in a rich household tries to take revenge on her lustful employer.

programme.title: Mannar Vageyara
programme.desc: Madhi helps his brother Arivu unite with the love of his life, which causes trouble between the families. When Madhi tells his parents about the woman he loves, they disapprove of his relationship.

programme.title: Ivan Thanthiran
programme.desc: Two engineering dropouts stumble upon the activities of a corrupt education minister owning engineering colleges and expose him. The minister wants revenge and launches a manhunt for them. The cat-and-mouse game begins.

programme.title: Anandam Vilayudum Veedu
programme.desc: While Muthupandi and Kaasi, two half-brothers, lead harmonious lives with their large families, their formidable unity is threatened by the evil scheme of an old nemesis.

programme.title: Thiruttu Payale 2
programme.desc: An honest police officer is tasked with taping the calls of elite professionals by a senior official. On the job, he learns about an online sociopath and sets out to expose him.

programme.title: Yaman
programme.desc: After losing his father to a bunch of scheming politicians, a young man decides to wade into the corrupt and unscrupulous world of politics to avenge his death.

programme.title: Vanavarayan Vallavarayan
programme.desc: Vanavarayan and Vallavarayan are two brothers who share a strong bond. Problems arise when Vanavarayan meets Anjali, a beautiful girl, at a wedding and falls in love with her.

programme.title: Iru Mugan
programme.desc: Love creates a new drug called Speed which was used by Hitler during WW2 to transform humans into superhumans. Agillan lost his wife and quits his job as RAW Agent.

programme.title: Nota
programme.desc: A bachelor who is unaware of the political world is appointed a Chief Minister when his corrupt father retires.

programme.title: Kuttram 23
programme.desc: ACP Vetrimaaran unravels a crime racket involving medical professionals. However, his task becomes harder every day as the case becomes murkier and complex.

programme.title: Veerame Vaagai Soodum
programme.desc: A normal man from a middle-class family questioning the authorities for abusing their powers.

programme.title: Kolamavu Kokila
programme.desc: Kokila, who has financial issues, gets involved in a drug racket to earn quick money. Eventually, her family also gets dragged in the internal drug war which, in turn, puts their lives at risk.

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep95
programme.desc: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma

programme.title: Hagola Ep15
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Hagola Ep16
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.desc: Guru’s onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole’s unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of it’s kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.desc: Valli, a witty lady, thrives in a quaint village where she works as a moneylender. While her mother strives to find her perfect match, Valli crosses paths with the soft-spoken Karthik.

programme.title: Jab Pyaar Kisise Hota Hai
programme.desc: Sooraj Dhanrajgir, a playboy, falls in love with Komal, who rejects him because of his vices and gives him time to change. Things go awry when a little boy shows up claiming to be his son.

programme.title: Fight Club: Members Only
programme.desc: Four friends decide to start an underground club that lets youngsters fight against each other for money. However, things take a turn after a man gets killed and they are charged with the crime.

programme.title: Kidnap
programme.desc: Kabir sets out to seek revenge against a businessman named Raina for falsely accusing him and getting him arrested by kidnapping his daughter Sonia.

programme.title: Pyar Ki Ladai
programme.desc: A jobless man spends his time doing unfruitful things, but his life changes when he falls in love with the sister of a sarpanch. However, to marry her, he must win a kabaddi match.

programme.title: Mumbai Delhi Mumbai
programme.desc: Pia travels to Delhi to meet a prospective groom whom she is determined to turn down. However, fate plays a tricky game on her when she meets her soulmate in the very city that she dreads visiting.

programme.title: Kunwara
programme.desc: Raju and Urmila meet in New Zealand and fall in love. However, when Raju helps a pregnant woman with a jilted lover, he ends up sabotaging his love life.

programme.title: Yeh Lamhe Judaai Ke
programme.desc: Dushant, an aspiring singer, is encouraged by Jaya to achieve his dreams. However, after Dushant becomes successful, his other friends try to create misunderstandings between him and Jaya.

programme.title: Yeh Lamhe Judaai Ke
programme.desc: Dushant, an aspiring singer, is encouraged by Jaya to achieve his dreams. However, after Dushant becomes successful, his other friends try to create misunderstandings between him and Jaya.

programme.title: LIE
programme.desc: Sathyam and Chaitra meet unexpectedly and decide to only lie to each other. Soon, after they fall in love, Sathyam encounters Padmanabham, a criminal on the run from the Indian police.

programme.title: Heroes
programme.desc: Two students embark on a trip to film a documentary focussing on why one must not join the Indian Armed Forces. However, by the end of their project, their perspective goes through a paradigm shift.

programme.title: I Love You
programme.desc: Santosh, a carefree youth, parts ways with his lover, Dharmika, during his college days. Years later, after his marriage to Gowri, he runs into her, which leaves him in a dilemma.

programme.title: Chalte Chalte
programme.desc: Raj, the owner of a truck company, pursues Priya, a fashion designer, and eventually gets married to her. Differences between the two lead to a separation that threatens to destroy their relationship.

programme.title: Force 2
programme.desc: ACP Yashwardhan, a dutiful and honest police officer, teams up with RAW agent Kamaljit Kaur to expose an inside informer who leaks sensitive information to a foreign agency targeting the RAW agents.

programme.title: Hawas
programme.desc: Natwarlal, a gangster, hires Anil and sends him to Shailendra Singh. Anil must seduce Shailendra's daughter, Neetu Singh, so that he can seize their wealth.

programme.title: Beqabu
programme.desc: Raja helps imprison a terrorist who then murders him. Years later, Raja's girlfriend comes across his lookalike in Nepal and decides to find the truth.

programme.title: Kya Kehna
programme.desc: Priya falls in love with Rahul, a womaniser, who jilts her after she gets pregnant. However, when she is ostracised by everyone, Ajay, her best friend, supports and helps her.

programme.title: Om Shanti Om
programme.desc: Om, a junior film artist, is smitten by Shantipriya, a renowned actress, but is killed while trying to save her from a fire accident. Thirty years later, he is reborn and sets out to avenge her death.

programme.title: Lucknow Central
programme.desc: Kishen, an inmate in a Lucknow jail, yearns to be set free. When he learns that a few prisoners must form a band, he sees it as his ticket to freedom.

programme.title: Lucknow Central
programme.desc: Kishen, an inmate in a Lucknow jail, yearns to be set free. When he learns that a few prisoners must form a band, he sees it as his ticket to freedom.

programme.title: Kambakkht Ishq
programme.desc: Simrita, a doctor, performs her first surgery on Viraj, a man she hates. She soon realises that she accidentally left her watch inside his body and must do whatever it takes to save her career.

programme.title: Yajamana
programme.desc: Krishna, the son-in-law of the village head, becomes the biggest enemy of Devi Shetty, a cruel gangster, when Devi decides to plunder the oil resources of the village and ruin villagers' livelihood.

programme.title: Auzaar
programme.desc: Suraj, a CBI officer, learns that his friend Yash and his father run an illegal business. He is assigned the task to investigate Yash but he decides to convince Yash to mend his ways.

programme.title: Saheb Biwi Aur Gangster Returns
programme.desc: Aditya is trying to recover from his wife's betrayal and his physical disability. Meanwhile, Indrajeet Singh, a prince whose property was confiscated by Aditya's family, returns to exact revenge.

programme.title: Kaun Hai Villain
programme.desc: ADGP Mathew finds himself trapped in a cat-and-mouse game with a mysterious killer when he starts investigating the murders of six men who died of the same reason.

programme.title: Prince
programme.desc: A thief plans the robbery of a lifetime. However, he wakes up one morning to realise that he has lost his memory and his life is at stake.

programme.title: Feet Up With The Stars
programme.desc: The host interacts with celebrities about their work and personal life. Meanwhile, the guests also reveal certain secrets about themselves and indulge in gossip.

programme.title: Ek Aur Bol Bachchan
programme.desc: Rehman and his sister move to Bheemarajapuram, where a local landlord employs him at his house. He introduces himself as Ram but later has to face severe trouble to keep up this lie.

programme.title: Meera
programme.desc: After Meera marries Rana Bhojraj to strengthen the ties between their clans, her husband learns about the man she loves. In response, he asks her to commit the ultimate sacrifice.

programme.title: White Christmas
programme.desc: Irving Berlin's songs and dances are performed by two happy couples who discover that love, romance and a Christmas Eve snowfall make everyone's dreams come true. The beloved title song of this film was introduced in the film HOLIDAY INN.

programme.title: Roxanne
programme.desc: Inspired by Cyrano de Bergerac, the comic story of a man with the heart of a great lover, the soul of a poet, and the nose for trouble.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: To rescue his children, an adult Peter Pan must return to Neverland and battle an old enemy . . . and rediscover the child in himself.

programme.title: The Dirty Dozen
programme.desc: World War II. An impossible mission ... The fate of the Allied invasion hanging in the balance. 12 men with nothing left to lose. Now the fate of the free world depends on a group of convicted murderers, thieves and thugs - The Dirth Dozen.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 3
programme.desc: Police officers Riggs (Mel Gibson) and Murtaugh (Danny Glover) team for the third time. programme.title: Silenced Tree
programme.desc: Hayati is a small-town literature teacher and author who can’t move on from his past: his failing marriage, his sick mother, a decaying walnut tree, and memories of his father. When his wife’s body is found, the innocent Hayati confesses to the murder.

programme.title: Adam
programme.desc: Abla runs a modest local bakery from her home in Casablanca where she lives alone with her 8-year-old daughter, Warda. When Samia, a young pregnant woman knocks on their door, Abla is far from imagining that her life will change forever.

programme.title: Joy of Fatherhood
programme.desc: Felix enjoys his single life to the fullest, but a ferret bites him, sterilizing him in the process. He tries everything in his power to find the soon-to-be mother of his only child, the result of his first and last sperm donation.

programme.title: Wacky Heroes
programme.desc: Two penniless brothers embark on a strange mission to protect and give their younger sister a better future. Armed with nothing but masks, cameras and their wits, they set out to take down the neighbourhood criminals. Soon, fame and power comes knocking.

programme.title: Veins of the World
programme.desc: After his father dies in a tragic car accident, 11-year-old Amra sets out to continue his father’s vision of the traditional nomad way of life and to continue his fight against global mining companies who threaten to destroy it.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: A Wicked Game
programme.desc: A violent assault on a German tourist pits Ambassador Karla Lorenz against friends and fellow diplomats as she tries to discover who is behind this and a string of other attacks on young women in the city.

programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Chechen boy Ramasan grows up in Macondo, a refugee settlement on the outskirts of Vienna. Living alone with his mother and two little sisters, Ramasan takes over the role of the father assuming the responsibility for his small family.

programme.title: Detective Durant: Young, Blonde & Dead
programme.desc: When the mutilated bodies of three girls are found, police affirm that a serial killer is on the loose. As part of investigations, Inspector Julia enters the world of the rich and mighty – where the killer might be closer to her than she’d ever imagine.

programme.title: A Summer In Brittany

programme.title: A Summer in Vietnam: Part 1

programme.title: The Girl With Nine Wigs

programme.desc: Three unlikely assassins dream of doing the impossible: kill Chilean dictator Augusto Pincochet. On a Sunday afternoon in 1986, a Physical Education teacher, a Psychologist Tamara, and a football enthusiast, sought to rewrite the future of Chile.

programme.title: Detective Durant: Murderous Days
programme.desc: Notorious serial killer, Gurnot, is behind bars but a copycat has emerged on the streets. Things get increasingly frightening when detectives Julia and Felix discover that the new killer seems to know too much about Gurnot’s style of killing.

programme.title: The Girl With Nine Wigs
programme.desc: Sophie has just started her studies, but her life is turned upside down when she is diagnosed with cancer. However, her lust for life drives her to break free from her illness, and she does so with nine wigs, each bringing out an aspect of herself.

programme.title: A Summer in Vietnam: Part 2
programme.desc: After getting bitten by a snake and waking up in a remote village in Vietnam, Paula sets off on her quest to find her twin sister and the doctor who had treated her. However, she soon learns of her sister’s dark secret.

programme.title: Murder. Money. Zurich. III - Borchert and the Last Hope
programme.desc: Thomas Borchert, an “unlicensed attorney” is consulted by the family of architect Anton Schenider who died from Multiple Sclerosis. The family suspects malpractice on the part of his neurologist, but the autopsy creates more questions than answers.

programme.title: The Order Of Things
programme.desc: Corrado, a policeman in charge of immigration control, meets a young Somali woman on a field assignment in Libya, who left her war-ravaged country to go to Europe. He finds himself having to make a choice between obeying his orders and saving her life.

programme.title: The Violin Teacher
programme.desc: Laerte, a talented violinist, is forced to teach in a public school in a Brazilian slum after failing to get into the renowned São Paulo Symphonic Orchestra. Laerte grows closer to his students but has to make a difficult choice between them and his dream.

programme.title: The Summer Of Flying Fish
programme.desc: While on vacation with her father, Manena experiences first love, and witnesses the friction between her father, a rich landowner obsessed with exterminating all carp fish in his lagoon, and the local Mapuche tribe who decides to stand up to him.

programme.title: Murder. Money. Zurich. IV - Borchert and the Force of Habit
programme.desc: “Lawyer without a license” Thomas Borchert wants to save two confessed burglars from a murder charge. But with the evidence stacked against them, their only hope is to track down the real killer themselves.

programme.title: Samudera
programme.desc: An Illegal maid who accidentally drowned her employer's infant, now faces the dilemma on whether to leave the country with her daughter or stay and face the consequences.

programme.title: Far Frontiers
programme.desc: Maria, wife of a deputy commander of a Russian military base in Kyrgyzstan, begins a relationship with another officer. Their affair quickly spirals out of control, fatally and irreversibly changing the course of Maria's and her family's life.

programme.title: Pelican Blood
programme.desc: Weibke and her nine-year-old daughter Nicolina are elated when they finally adopt five-year-old Raya. However, Weibke soon notices Raya displaying abnormally aggressive behavior. With advice from experts, Weibke is forced to make a painful decision.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 11
programme.desc: A serial killer who targets college girls has struck again, and the town of Neptune is terrified. Keith, who previously worked on the case, temporarily returns to the sheriff's department to help catch the killer. Meanwhile, Veronica's own investigative caseload (and income) increases as she conducts background checks to get the "dirt" on her schoolmates' parents. But for her computer geek friend, Mac (recurring guest star TINA MAJORINO), the information Veronica learns may have life-altering consequences.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 12
programme.desc: When parents accuse Veronica of providing a fake ID to their son, who's now in an alcohol-induced coma, and files suit, the search to find who's responsible leads Veronica to a clandestine, exclusive organization operating on Neptune High's campus with a possible connection to Duncan. Meanwhile, Aaron Echolls (recurring guest star HARRY HAMLIN) hires Keith to find out who's supplying pictures to the tabloids that humiliate his wife, Lynn (recurring guest star LISA RINNA). Later, Veronica hides an electronic device in the office of guidance counselor Rebecca James (recurring guest star PAULA MARSHALL) to eavesdrop on grief counseling sessions and learns some surprising information about her friends.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 13
programme.desc: After being hired by hip-hop heavyweight Percy "Bone" Hamilton (ANTHONY ANDERSON - "Kangaroo Jack," "Barbershop") to find his kidnapped daughter, Veronica and Keith look to the music mogul's long list of enemies and family members and the girl's Neptune High social circle for clues to her whereabouts. Meanwhile, following his mother's apparent suicide, Logan cynically endures the effusive displays of grief by his father, Aaron (recurring guest star HARRY HAMLIN), as they prepare for the memorial ceremony.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 14
