programme.title: Fawlty Towers S2 Ep04
programme.desc: The Kipper And The Corpse - Chaos reigns as one of the guests – with total disregard for Basil's blood pressure – is found dead in bed. Doubtless the kippers were responsible. Basil attempts to conceal the body.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S1 Ep10
programme.desc: My Old Man and the Sea - Doogie gets invited to spend a three-day weekend in Palm Springs with Wanda and her family, but then remembers that his father has scheduled their annual fishing trip together for the same weekend.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep11
programme.desc: Witchstock - Paige finds herself transported back in time to an era of free love and free magic, where she discovers Grams, who is on a crusade to rid the world of evil through the magical power of love.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote S6 Ep17
programme.desc: Murder - According To - Jessica's former student (Diana Canova), creator of a highly rated television series, becomes a suspect when the network programmer (Gary Sandy) is murdered.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S3 Ep17
programme.desc: Surveillance - The brutal attack of a young cellist, Cassie Germaine in her apartment leads Detectives Benson and Stabler to investigate her orchestra conductor Robert Prescott.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S3 Ep18
programme.desc: Guilt - ADA Cabot goes above and beyond her duty in her search for evidence to convict the serial abuser, which led to an illegal search done by the detectives and in return jeopardises everyone involved.

programme.title: Fawlty Towers S2 Ep05
programme.desc: Anniversary - Basil has remembered their wedding anniversary. Sybil has no idea he has planned a surprise party and invited all their friends. She thinks he has forgotten, and storms off to play golf.

programme.title: Airwolf S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Mind Of The Machine - The creator of an Airwolf simulator, who covet's Hawke's place behind Airwolf's controls, is being manipulated by an associate who plans to steal Airwolf.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S1 Ep10
programme.desc: My Old Man and the Sea - Doogie gets invited to spend a three-day weekend in Palm Springs with Wanda and her family, but then remembers that his father has scheduled their annual fishing trip together for the same weekend.

programme.title: The Love Boat S2 Ep15
programme.desc: Second Time Around/ The Now Marriage/ My Sister, Irene - Irene Austin (Martha Raye) agrees to meet her college classmate, Andy Hopkins (Ray Bolger), after 40 years, then panics and tells him she's Irene's sister; Dr. Todd Gardiner (Peter Marshall) wrote a book about open marriage, but finds his own marriage, to Eleanor Gardiner (Barbara Rush), in jeopardy, as he gets close to a fellow passenger (Phyllis Davis); Doc's (Bernie Kopell) ex-wife (Tina Louise) arrives with a new fiancé (Lyle Waggoner).

programme.title: Cheers S2 Ep02
programme.desc: Little Sister Don't Cha - While Carla’s in labor, her promiscuous sister goes on the prowl at Cheers.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Every Dog Has His Doogie - Doogie is angry and frustrated that Eastman Hospital will not admit homeless people who are in need of medical attention. Canfield has a difficult meeting with the hospital’s board of directors.

programme.title: Airwolf S1 Ep12
programme.desc: To Snare A Wolf - A ruthless government operator, who will stop at nothing to capture Airwolf for his department, plots a massive high intensity satellite survey.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep12
programme.desc: Prince Charmed - After Piper vanquishes a demon from Wyatt's room, she knows about the rest of her life concerning Wyatt. Paige and Phoebe decide to remind Piper of the importance of love by conjuring up a "Mr. Right."

programme.title: Bewitched S2 Ep19
programme.desc: Fastest Gun On Madison Avenue - While Samantha waits for Darrin alone in a restaurant, she is hit upon by an obnoxious drunk. Darrin arrives and she knocks him out with some magical help.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote S6 Ep18
programme.desc: O'Malley's Luck - Jessica's old friend, NYPD Detective Lt. O'Malley (Pat Hingle), investigates the suspicious suicide of a wealthy New York developer's wife (Eileen Barnett).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Ridicule - When a young wife is found dead after what appears to have been an auto-erotic encounter, the detectives find that the deceased and her girlfriends had recently been accused of raping a male stripper.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S3 Ep11
programme.desc: Monogamy - When a pregnant woman's unborn child is ripped from her abdomen in an horrific attack, the detectives go on a frantic search for the child, in the hopes that it could have survived.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Protection - When a 6-year-old boy with a troubled past is shot and abandoned in an emergency room by his frantic mother, the detectives attempt to track down the child's missing family in hope of finding the shooter.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep17
programme.desc: Heal Thyself - The old adage about doctors making the worst patients is proven to be true when Col. Potter gets the mumps. Things only get worse when Charles Winchester comes down with the same illness and the two are quarantined together and succeed in making themselves and everyone around them miserable. The temporary surgical replacement arrives and everything is going smoothly until the new doctor has a breakdown from the strain of working on the front lines. Hawkeye and B.J. have a sobering moment where they realize that it could have just as well have been them breaking down from the very same pressures.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep18
programme.desc: Old Soldiers - Col. Potter abruptly leaves for Tokyo and puts Hawkeye in charge. Hawkeye’s main concern during his term of leadership is how to cope with an influx of Korean refugee children into the 4077th. The injured and ill children are a lot easier to deal with than the high-spirited ones in good health. Hawkeye and the others are also concerned for Col. Potter, fearing that his secrecy around his trip might mean that their commander has a medical emergency of a personal and serious nature. When Potter returns, he tells them that an old Calvary buddy from the first world war has died, leaving Potter as the sole survivor of that troupe. Potter invites Hawkeye, B.J., Hot Lips, Charles, Klinger and Father Mulcahy to witness an emotional personal tribute to his dear fallen friend.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep19
programme.desc: Morale Victory - Hawkeye and B.J. complain to Col. Potter just one time too many about the poor recreational activities for the 4077th, so Potter quiets them by making them the new company morale officers. While Hawkeye and B.J. are busy putting their money where their mouths are, Charles’ morale is better than ever after what he views as one of his most successful surgeries. Unfortunately for Charles, his patient doesn’t agree with him.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep20
programme.desc: Lend a Hand - Hawkeye discovers that the 4077th is planning a surprise party for him; since Hawkeye doesn’t want a surprise party, he volunteers to operate on a wounded soldier at the front. Much to Hawkeye’s dismay, the wise-cracking Dr. Borelli comes along, a doctor with whom Hawkeye has frequently butted heads in the past. Despite past differences, the two men encounter adversity which binds them together and helps them to forgive old grievances.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep21
programme.desc: Goodbye, Cruel World - Klinger tries to bring a touch of Toledo to his quarters and the constant ribbing he receives results in a renewed effort to get out of the army. Meanwhile, the medical staff is perplexed when an Asian-American war hero attempts suicide rather than be sent home for his battle injuries.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep22
programme.desc: Dreams - The Korean War haunts the 4077th and even dreams cannot bring escape. Heavy casualties lead to two days without sleep; as members of the M*A*S*H unit find moments to steal catnaps, each person’s dreams are revealed. Margaret dreams of herself with a handsome groom in a misty meadow, their love interrupted by soldiers dragging her groom off to war. Hawkeye finds himself undermined by his inability to stay awake in his own dream, while B.J. faces his greatest fear when his dream self operates madly while his wife is lost to him. Charles and Klinger both experience odd dreams where they are both helpless while Father Mulcahy dreams he has become the Pope but there is a price that must be paid.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote S6 Ep14
programme.desc: How To Make A Killing - Jessica enters the world of high finance when she attempts to solve the murder of her stockbroker (John Calvin), a partner in a prestigious Wall Street firm.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote S6 Ep15
programme.desc: The Fixer Upper - While in California, Jessica is reunited with her niece, Victoria (Genie Francis), a real estate broker who becomes a suspect when a wealthy client is murdered.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote S6 Ep16
programme.desc: The Big Show of 1965 - Jessica attends a variety-show reunion to research a 25-year-old unsolved murder case.

programme.title: The Love Boat S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Heads Or Tails/ The Little People/ Mona Of The Movies - Two buddies (Richard Gilliland and Adam Arkin) make a bet - for a pizza - to see who can get a date with Julie (Lauren Tewes). A man (Orson Bean) hopes to have a romantic relationship with his matinée idol crush (Rhonda Fleming), but he is intimidated by her fame and they seem to have repeated bad timing. A young man (Edward Albert) brings his parents on board for their 25th wedding anniversary and he runs into a girl (Patty McCormack) from home, to whom he is attracted. The problem is that his parents (Billy Barty and Patty Maloney) are little people and the young woman inadvertently reveals that little people make her uncomfortable.

programme.title: The Love Boat S2 Ep12
programme.desc: The Folks From Home/ The Captain's Cup/ Legal Eagle - The Captain (Gavin MacLeod) is expecting a prestigious award but the presenter (Pat Harrington Jr.) may not be whom he expects it to be; Doc (Bernie Kopell) becomes attached to an elderly couple (John McIntire and Jeanette Nolan) from his hometown, only to have to perform a life-threatening operation on the woman; and a recently divorced man (Bert Convy) runs into the lawyer (Leigh Taylor-Young) who represented his ex-wife in the divorce.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S1 Ep07
programme.desc: Vinnie Video Vici - Vinnie is making a video documentary on Doogie for a class project. He records Doogie singing in the shower to achieve a cinema verite feel and to photograph him at work too.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S1 Ep08
programme.desc: Blood and Remembrance - After an argument over Doogie’s cancellation of dates due to work, Wanda and he decide to break up. Doogie broods over his break-up with Wanda, whom he is not about to call as he feels she started the fight.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S1 Ep09
programme.desc: She Ain't Heavy, She's My Cousin - Vinnie is excited about his blind date with Wanda’s cousin, Yvette—that is until he sees her. Despite his shock and disappointment about her weight, Vinnie and Yvette have a good time playing pool together.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep08
programme.desc: Sword and the City - The Charmed Ones are called upon by The Lady of the Lake to help protect Excalibur, the legendary Sword in the Stone.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep09
programme.desc: Little Monsters - After vanquishing a Manticore demon, Piper, Phoebe and Paige become foster parents to its orphaned half-breed infant and they believe that by raising the child with love they can change its destiny.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep10
programme.desc: Chris-Crossed - Bianca arrives from the future to take Chris' powers. In an attempt to distract the Charmed Ones, Bianca casts a spell which causes the sisters to act on their true desires.

programme.title: Airwolf S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Fight Like A Dove - When her father, a famous Nazi hunter, is murdered, a young woman seeks revenge with the use of Airwolf.

programme.title: Airwolf S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Mad Over Miami - Dominic accepts a dangerous and decidedly hush-hush mission sponsored by refugee Cubans to ransom five prisoners in exchange for two million dollars.

programme.title: Fawlty Towers S2 Ep04
programme.desc: The Kipper And The Corpse - Chaos reigns as one of the guests – with total disregard for Basil's blood pressure – is found dead in bed. Doubtless the kippers were responsible. Basil attempts to conceal the body.

programme.desc: Anniversary - Basil has remembered their wedding anniversary. Sybil has no idea he has planned a surprise party and invited all their friends. She thinks he has forgotten, and storms off to play golf.

programme.title: Fawlty Towers S2 Ep06
programme.desc: Basil The Rat - Basil Fawlty is a much put-upon, hard-working hotel manager whose life is plagued by dead guests, hotel inspectors and riff-raff. OHis biggest headache is his ‘little nest of vipers’ - his nagging wife Sibyl.

programme.title: The Scarlet Pimpernel Ep01
programme.desc: Part 1 of 2 - During the turmoil of the French Revolution, English aristocrat Percy Blakeney, often aided by his League of friends, secretly undertakes various daring missions as the Scarlet Pimpernel.

programme.title: Cheers S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Pick A Con..Any Con - Sam tries to set up a sting to catch a crooked poker player.

programme.title: Cheers S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Someone Single, Someone Blue - Diane proposes marriage to Sam in order to save her mom’s inheritance.

programme.title: Cheers S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Show Down—Part I - Sam’s overshadowed by his charming older brother that visits Cheers.

programme.title: Cheers S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Show Down —Part II - Sam’s brother forces Diane to chose between him and Sam.

programme.title: Cheers S2 Ep01
programme.desc: Power Play - Sam and Diane hit speed bumps on their road to romance.

programme.title: Cheers S2 Ep02
programme.desc: Little Sister Don't Cha - While Carla’s in labor, her promiscuous sister goes on the prowl at Cheers.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S3 Ep13
programme.desc: Prodigy - The discovery of a man and woman stabbed leaves the team with the gruesome job of identifying the victims -- a difficult task as the woman's head and hands are missing.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S3 Ep14
programme.desc: Counterfeit - The discovery of a raped and murdered woman near her car forces Detectives Benson and "Fin" to become partners to determine both the motive for the crime .

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S3 Ep15
programme.desc: Execution - As a serial killer awaits his execution in three days, the detectives race against time to determine if he also murdered and raped another victim whose assailant was never identified.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep23
programme.desc: War Co-Respondent - Aggie O’Shea, a famous war correspondent, arrives at the 4077th and is instantly smitten with B.J. Hunnicut. Aggie is intelligent, warm and vivacious and B.J. soon fears that he is falling in love with her in return and he struggles to remain faithful to Peg. Hawkeye is also attracted to the lovely writer but is clear-headed enough to help his married friend realize that Aggie is merely an infatuation during a desperate and lonely war.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep24
programme.desc: Back Pay - Hawkeye is incensed by the way civilian doctors back in the states are profiting from the war, so he decides to take matters into his own hands and sends the Army a bill for services rendered. This unheard-of demand inevitably brings on an Army investigation. Meanwhile, three Korean Medics arrive at the 4077th and Charles reluctantly agrees to demonstrate some American medical practices for their benefit. During Charles’ rather condescending tutorial, his back goes out. When the medics offer Charles an acupuncture treatment he refuses; then when the pain is unbearable, he changes his mind and gets a pleasant surprise.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep25
programme.desc: April Fools - Colonel Daniel Webster Tucker is an officer with a reputation for discipline and he heads to the 4077th just as a wave of April Fool’s Day pranks start hitting the unit. Col. Potter tries without success to halt the jokes before the arrival of the stodgy Col. Tucker, who is appalled by the unprofessional behavior of the unit and lets them know it. This does not endear him to the capricious M*A*S*H unit, and they bear him a wide berth. When Colonel Tucker has a heart attack at the Officer’s Club, the company rushes to his aid; the joke is on them when the Colonel suddenly revives and says “April Fools!”

programme.title: M*A*S*H S9 Ep01
programme.desc: The Best Of Enemies - Hawkeye is on his way to Seoul when he is ambushed by a North Korean soldier and taken prisoner. While Hawkeye gets acquainted with his captor, the members of the 4077th are blissfully unaware of his plight and amuse themselves by holding a bridge tournament. Colonel Potter and Charles Winchester are cool adversaries in the battle for bridge champion of the 4077th. Hawkeye's resolve and wits see him through yet another harrowing war experience.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote S6 Ep17
programme.desc: Murder - According To - Jessica's former student (Diana Canova), creator of a highly rated television series, becomes a suspect when the network programmer (Gary Sandy) is murdered.

programme.desc: El Kid/The Last Hundred Bucks/Isosceles Triangle - Larry and Cybill Hartman (Robert Urich and Heather Menzies-Urich) wanted to adopt a baby but end up with Pepito, a streetwise orphan (Gabriel Melgar); Doc and Stubing fall for Julie's friend, Karen Maynard (Connie Stevens); Wes and Renee Larson (Dave Madden and Dena Dietrich) and their friend, April Dunlevy, (Rue McClanahan) plan a business deal with a former executive (Dabney Coleman), who is a fraud.

programme.title: The Love Boat S2 Ep14
programme.desc: Julie Falls Hard/ Double Wedding/ The Dummies - Julie (Lauren Tewes) falls in love with a man (Tony Roberts) and his daughters (Annrae Walterhouse and Melora Hardin). Will she leave the ship for Alaska? Twins (Cyb Barnstable and Patricia Barnstable), unhappy with their perspective spouses (David Nelson and Fred Travalena), switch places. A separated couple (Ruth Buzzi and Sid Caesar) are assigned to the same cabin; they and their dummies entertain the passengers.

programme.desc: And They Are Us - Hawke and Dominic are sent to an African nation to neutralize a mercenary pilot - a man from Hawke's military past who may know the whereabouts of his MIA brother.

programme.desc: Mind Of The Machine - The creator of an Airwolf simulator, who covet's Hawke's place behind Airwolf's controls, is being manipulated by an associate who plans to steal Airwolf.

programme.title: Bewitched S2 Ep15
programme.desc: The Magic Cabin - Larry demands Darrin take some time off with Samantha to go to his forest cabin. Seeing how run down it is. Samantha twitches it up to look wonderful.

programme.title: Bewitched S2 Ep16
programme.desc: Maid To Order - Darrin decides that Samantha needs help around the house and insists that she hire a maid.

programme.title: Bewitched S2 Ep17
programme.desc: And Then There Were Three - Endora pops into the waiting room from the delivery room to tell Darrin she has a granddaughter, whom she names Tabitha.

programme.title: Bewitched S2 Ep18
programme.desc: My Baby. The Tycoon - Gladys and Abner give Tabitha a share of stock as a gift. The next day the stock almost doubled its worth. Darrin suspects Tabitha influenced the stock's value.

programme.title: Peace & Prosperity Ep177
programme.desc: Following three inter-Korean summits and two North Korea-U.S. summits, a journey towards peace on the Korean Peninsula has become irreversible. 2019 will see countless twists and turns in negotiations, as all parties involved work to build a lasting peace in search for a winning solution for all. No longer a simply political, abstract notion, peace is now an imperative that leads to the prosperity of the Korean Peninsula and the international community. Arirang TV launches the new program "Peace and Prosperity" to explore paths to peace and prosperity, with a special emphasis on the expected role of Seoul.

"Diplomat Talks" will be sharing stories from ambassadors, never been told before, with its viewers around the world.

programme.desc: Reckoning - On the run and out of options, Kwan and Soren have a difference of opinion. John makes a horrible discovery.

programme.title: Halo Ep6
programme.desc: Solace - Survivors from battle return to Reach. John confronts Dr. Halsey, and the lies of his past. The new prisoner seems to know John better than he knows himself.

programme.title: Halo Ep7
programme.desc: Inheritance - Kwan’s journey to uncover her family’s “true purpose” takes her deep into the deserts of Madrigal. Soren obsesses over unfinished business.

programme.title: Halo Ep8
programme.desc: Allegiance - John and Makee come to terms with their shared vision. Halsey has one last chance to save her mission, and herself.

programme.title: Girl, Interrupted
programme.desc: Based on writer Susanna Kaysen's account of her 18-month stay at a mental hospital in the late 1960s.

programme.title: Wisecrack Ep9

programme.title: Ultimate Tag Ep9
programme.desc: Never Stop - The self-styled ‘King of Parkour’ is just 1 of the remarkable competitors in the Tag Arena. They are being hunted-down by the most menacing athletes on to win a cash prize.

programme.title: Ultimate Tag Ep10
programme.desc: Dangerously Fast - A military veteran, a college soccer player, and a dancer are just 3 of the competitors in the Tag Arena. Bodies are pushed to their limits as they battle the pro-Taggers. And there’s just one rule: Don’t.Get.Caught!

programme.title: From Russia To Iran: Crossing The Wild Frontier Ep1
programme.desc: Levison arrives in Sochi on the edge of the Black Sea before flying into the Caucasus region by military helicopter. After being dropped off on a remote track, he searches for someone to take him to the nearest town.

programme.title: From Russia To Iran: Crossing The Wild Frontier Ep2
programme.desc: Levison and Rasheed join a wedding celebration and a bizarre mock bride kidnapping during a motorcade involving what appears to be a real policeman and live ammunition.

programme.title: From Russia To Iran: Crossing The Wild Frontier Ep3
programme.desc: Episode 3 sees the explorer and his guide journey by any means available deeper into the badlands of Dagestan, a region of Russia that the British Foreign Office warns against visiting under any circumstances.

programme.title: From Russia To Iran: Crossing The Wild Frontier Ep4
programme.desc: Episode 4 sees the explorer and his guide journey by any means available through Azerbaijan – a rugged country known as The Lands Of Fire - and the lush mountains of Georgia.

programme.desc: Grand Finals - Valorant Champions Tour 2022: Masters

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Battle to Save a Sea Lion Ep2
programme.desc: Battle wind and waves to find a sea lion trapped in a plastic ring. Then visit the rescue center, where over 80 orphan seals must be fed several times a day to prepare for release into the wild, and see an Amazonian duck get a miraculous operation.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Lifesavers Ep2
programme.desc: Meet a border collie that protects aircraft from lethal bird strikes, a sprocker spaniel whose sense of smell is saving imperilled water voles, and an Anatolian shepherd that helps conserve Africa’s most endangered big cat, the cheetah.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - November-December - Full Circle Ep6
programme.desc: Witness some of the most incredible natural events in November, from the millions of Monarch butterflies that converge in Mexico’s forests to the deep fog that shrouds the city of Dubai, signalling the start of winter.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ultimate Predator Ep1
programme.desc: Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its prey’s heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ocean Voyagers Ep2
programme.desc: Navigate the ocean’s vast distances, depths, and darkness with nomadic sharks that thrive in the blue emptiness. Meet a lone blue shark traversing stormy Atlantic seas, and hundreds of hammerheads returning to their Pacific island breeding ground.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Invasion Ep11
programme.desc: Non-native species have made their way into the Wild Wild East and staked their claim to the jagged coast. At White Point Beach Resort in Liverpool, Nova Scotia bunnies have hopped on in for an extended holiday. It’s turf wars between the beachcombers and the chalets dwellers. Meanwhile, the starling population is beginning to rival gulls and pigeons.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 - Animals Gone Wild Ep3
programme.desc: As the popular characters of songs and stories, farm animals are celebrated all over the world. But few stories tell of their sister species who live in the wild. These animals known primarily as livestock, beasts of burden, or even pets must fend for themselves beyond the fences of their domesticated kin.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Baby Sea Otter Finds a Family Ep1
programme.desc: Join the vet and his team in saving a massive sea lion caught in a plastic noose, and then visit the Rescue Center, where a harbor seal pup may lose its eyesight and a baby sea otter needs a risky but life-saving surgery.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Battle to Save a Sea Lion Ep2
programme.desc: Battle wind and waves to find a sea lion trapped in a plastic ring. Then visit the rescue center, where over 80 orphan seals must be fed several times a day to prepare for release into the wild, and see an Amazonian duck get a miraculous operation.

These animals known primarily as livestock, beasts of burden, or even pets must fend for themselves beyond the fences of their domesticated kin.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 2 - The Lower Zambezi Ep4
programme.desc: Food, water and shelter are essential to all life on earth from the smallest of beings to the largest, and along the banks of one of Africa’s greatest rivers, some animals struggle while others thrive. A rhythm drives all animals as they journey in search of what they need to survive, and each must decide where and when to move if they’re to succeed... These are the magical worlds of the Lower Zambezi.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Seasons Ep12
programme.desc: Wild Wild East travels through time and space to show what one-year — and four seasons — looks like for the wildest animals of Canada’s East-Coast.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Baby Sea Otter Finds a Family Ep1
programme.desc: Join the vet and his team in saving a massive sea lion caught in a plastic noose, and then visit the Rescue Center, where a harbor seal pup may lose its eyesight and a baby sea otter needs a risky but life-saving surgery.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Battle to Save a Sea Lion Ep2
programme.desc: Battle wind and waves to find a sea lion trapped in a plastic ring. Then visit the rescue center, where over 80 orphan seals must be fed several times a day to prepare for release into the wild, and see an Amazonian duck get a miraculous operation.

programme.desc: Meet a border collie that protects aircraft from lethal bird strikes, a sprocker spaniel whose sense of smell is saving imperilled water voles, and an Anatolian shepherd that helps conserve Africa’s most endangered big cat, the cheetah.

programme.desc: Witness some of the most incredible natural events in November, from the millions of Monarch butterflies that converge in Mexico’s forests to the deep fog that shrouds the city of Dubai, signalling the start of winter.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ultimate Predator Ep1
programme.desc: Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its prey’s heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ocean Voyagers Ep2
programme.desc: Navigate the ocean’s vast distances, depths, and darkness with nomadic sharks that thrive in the blue emptiness. Meet a lone blue shark traversing stormy Atlantic seas, and hundreds of hammerheads returning to their Pacific island breeding ground.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Deer Ep13
programme.desc: In Hampton, New Brunswick the deer population is running wild. In the summer locals struggle to maintain their crops from growing fawns and hungry does. Sightings have reached an all time high and residents fear the overpopulation may be at its tipping point.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Whales Ep14
programme.desc: Brier Island is at the western point of the Bay of Fundy in Nova Scotia. And in the surrounding waters live an incredible number of humpback whales and dolphins. On still waters, Humpbacks smash their tails, flap their fins, and breach one en masse. It’s an incredible sight. A pod of dolphins swims into the Bay of Fundy, feeding off herring. They’re soon joined by an Orca that capitalizes on their feeding strategies.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 1 - Elephant Rescue Ep1
programme.desc: When a trio of Elephants are orphaned in Zambia, they are rescued and trasported to a purpose-build nursery. But it won't be smooth-sailing for the young Pachyderms; life lessons will be tough to imprint before they are returned to the wild.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 1 - Camp Phoenix Herd Ep2
programme.desc: Camp Phoenix in Zambia’s Kafue National Park is elephant heaven. Here a herd of orphan elephants are being given another chance. Their human carers teach them the skills they’ll need to join an elephant herd in the wild.

programme.title: Seasons of the Wild 1 - The Everglades: The Season of Drought Ep1
programme.desc: In Southern Florida, a unique and complex ecosystem known as the Everglades has entered its winter season. Predator and prey are forced to live in close proximity due to a limited supply of water.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 - De Hoop: Place of Hope Ep5
programme.desc: This small park makes a big difference to endangered animals. Offering sanctuary to some of the biggest and smallest animals on the planet, witness how species come back from the edge of extinction to reclaim their place in Africa’s wilderness.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 - The Power of Playtime Ep1
programme.desc: Explore the ways that animals use play, including young gibbons in Thailand that practice falling from branches, elderly macaques that preserve their brains with playtime, and games that sharpen the profound intelligence of African elephants.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 - Rules of the Game Ep2
programme.desc: Young hyenas compete in tug of war, mischievous parrots play at picking apart tourists’ cars, and Atlantic spotted dolphins enjoy sophisticated social games amid seaweed—all following specific rules that hone social bonds.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - City of Riches Ep1
programme.desc: Stake out the Bay Family’s lush territory, where matriarch Anna offers lavish feasts but faces internal dissent. Size up her rival Mia, the streetwise Townies leader who’s eyeing a lifestyle upgrade, and check in with the isolated Mangrove Family.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Home Away from Home Ep2
programme.desc: Swim upriver with the Bay Family, where Anna offers a hand raising her grandpups before heading home to find interlopers on her turf. Watch a flood in the mangroves nearly sweep away a baby, and see the Townies eat clean through their resources.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Partners Ep3
programme.desc: Meet a golden retriever that assuages anxiety and helps heal PTSD, a shepherd mix who rescues mudslide survivors, a pair of spaniels who sniff out underground water leaks, and a group of teacher’s pets in the UK that assist children learning to read.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Protectors Ep4
programme.desc: A blind woman has found a new lease on life thanks to her canine running mate, a Jack Russell works as a super-nanny to a surprising array of species, and a team of dogs in Kenya are on daily patrol protecting endangered rhinos from poachers.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Deer Ep13
programme.desc: In Hampton, New Brunswick the deer population is running wild. In the summer locals struggle to maintain their crops from growing fawns and hungry does. Sightings have reached an all time high and residents fear the overpopulation may be at its tipping point.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 1 - Elephant Rescue Ep1
programme.desc: When a trio of Elephants are orphaned in Zambia, they are rescued and trasported to a purpose-build nursery. But it won't be smooth-sailing for the young Pachyderms; life lessons will be tough to imprint before they are returned to the wild.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - City of Riches Ep1
programme.desc: Stake out the Bay Family’s lush territory, where matriarch Anna offers lavish feasts but faces internal dissent. Size up her rival Mia, the streetwise Townies leader who’s eyeing a lifestyle upgrade, and check in with the isolated Mangrove Family.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Home Away from Home Ep2
programme.desc: Swim upriver with the Bay Family, where Anna offers a hand raising her grandpups before heading home to find interlopers on her turf. Watch a flood in the mangroves nearly sweep away a baby, and see the Townies eat clean through their resources.

programme.title: The Great Elephant Tale
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of three elephants across three very distinct African habitats. Their travels combine to tell the story of how these emotional and intelligent creatures evolved over millions of years to survive on the continent.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Partners Ep3
programme.desc: Meet a golden retriever that assuages anxiety and helps heal PTSD, a shepherd mix who rescues mudslide survivors, a pair of spaniels who sniff out underground water leaks, and a group of teacher’s pets in the UK that assist children learning to read.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Protectors Ep4
programme.desc: A blind woman has found a new lease on life thanks to her canine running mate, a Jack Russell works as a super-nanny to a surprising array of species, and a team of dogs in Kenya are on daily patrol protecting endangered rhinos from poachers.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Scent Detectives Ep5
programme.desc: A Labrador cross and its partner help prevent ecological disaster in Canada, a Lagotto Romagnolo unearths a rare delicacy in Washington forests, and a Belgian malinois team tracks down the critically endangered geometric tortoise to save the species.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Kangaroo 1 - Mob Rules Ep1
programme.desc: The Eastern Grey kangaroo is a sociable species, clustering together in small groups known as mobs. A mob is a social network focused on feeding, where members will come and go as they please, depending on the availability of food.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Kangaroo 1 - From Pouch to Foot Ep2
programme.desc: Eastern Grey kangaroos are prolific breeders, but bringing up baby is fraught with challenges. Predators, climate extremes, and lively joeys mean kangaroo mothers face a daily struggle to keep their young alive.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Whales Ep14
programme.desc: Brier Island is at the western point of the Bay of Fundy in Nova Scotia. And in the surrounding waters live an incredible number of humpback whales and dolphins. On still waters, Humpbacks smash their tails, flap their fins, and breach one en masse. It’s an incredible sight. A pod of dolphins swims into the Bay of Fundy, feeding off herring. They’re soon joined by an Orca that capitalizes on their feeding strategies.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 - The Power of Playtime Ep1
programme.desc: Explore the ways that animals use play, including young gibbons in Thailand that practice falling from branches, elderly macaques that preserve their brains with playtime, and games that sharpen the profound intelligence of African elephants.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 - Rules of the Game Ep2
programme.desc: Young hyenas compete in tug of war, mischievous parrots play at picking apart tourists’ cars, and Atlantic spotted dolphins enjoy sophisticated social games amid seaweed—all following specific rules that hone social bonds.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - City of Riches Ep1
programme.desc: Stake out the Bay Family’s lush territory, where matriarch Anna offers lavish feasts but faces internal dissent. Size up her rival Mia, the streetwise Townies leader who’s eyeing a lifestyle upgrade, and check in with the isolated Mangrove Family.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Home Away from Home Ep2
programme.desc: Swim upriver with the Bay Family, where Anna offers a hand raising her grandpups before heading home to find interlopers on her turf. Watch a flood in the mangroves nearly sweep away a baby, and see the Townies eat clean through their resources.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Partners Ep3
programme.desc: Meet a golden retriever that assuages anxiety and helps heal PTSD, a shepherd mix who rescues mudslide survivors, a pair of spaniels who sniff out underground water leaks, and a group of teacher’s pets in the UK that assist children learning to read.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Protectors Ep4
programme.desc: A blind woman has found a new lease on life thanks to her canine running mate, a Jack Russell works as a super-nanny to a surprising array of species, and a team of dogs in Kenya are on daily patrol protecting endangered rhinos from poachers.

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 - Mini Giants Ep1
programme.desc: Elephants, gorillas, rhinos, and bison are among the largest and most imposing land-dwelling mammals, but they all start out as helpless infants. See how babies from each species find their way to becoming giants.

programme.title: Baby Animals 1 - Mother's Darlings Ep2
programme.desc: Not all infants in the animal kingdom get to have a good mother. But these are the stories of the lucky ones, from a ring-tailed lemur who learns everything from its mom to a tiny orangutan that receives a constant supply of motherly cuddles.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 1 - Predators Uncovered Ep3
programme.desc: In the heart of the Zambian bush is a unique and special place. A beautiful Valley, bursting with life. It is home to a rich and diverse array of wildlife and is one of the last remaining strongholds for some of Africa's most endangered large carnivores.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 1 - Return of Hunters Ep4
programme.desc: Liuwa Plains National Park is a vast uncharted sea of golden grassland in the heart of Southern Africa. Remote and wild, it was once home to huge grazing herds of wildebeest and zebras, with predators such as lions and cheetahs lurking in the long grass. When civil war came to neighboring Angola, the abundant wildlife of Liuwa was quickly decimated by poachers, and for many years the park lay in a dormant, almost lifeless state. Peace has now returned and this film follows an extraordinary band of conservationists who are working to restore Liuwa to its former glory.

programme.title: Seasons of the Wild 1 - The Everglades: The Season of Flood Ep2
programme.desc: Waters flood Southern Florida's mangroves and marshes. Many of the 600 animal species that live in the Everglades disperse during this time, expanding their hunting and breeding grounds.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 - Kogelberg Ep6
programme.desc: Considered to be the most beautiful of the Cape’s protected areas, Kogelberg Nature Reserve has experienced minimal human interference. Discover the spectacular land and sea life flourishing in this unique botanical wonderland.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - Finding a Family Ep4
programme.desc: Mona, a female cotton top tamarin is all alone in her tropical forest home. She has left the security of her birth family to search for an unrelated troop which might provide her with a future mate.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - Romeo and Julieta Ep5
programme.desc: This is the story of Julieta, a female golden dart frog, in search of her Romeo. She’s about to lay her eggs and must find a male to fertilize them. Romeo’s calls guide her through the forest, but crossing the dense rainforest is no easy feat.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Hot Day in the New World Ep1
programme.desc: Follow penguins, iguanas, tortoises, frogs and tamarins from Mexico to Peru, and as far west as the Galapagos Islands, as they live out their daily dramas, affected by the sun’s heat, looming predators and hazardous weather conditions.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Asia's Longest Day Ep2
programme.desc: See how creatures from the Tibetan plateau, to the lush rainforests of Thailand, to Vietnam’s twisted mangroves, survive four extra hours of daylight once a year, searching for food, fighting for dominance and raising their families.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - A New Zealand Christmas Ep3
programme.desc: See how one animal family’s tragedy is another’s holiday dinner as New Zealand’s mainland and island creatures, including penguins, flightless birds, sea lions, and sharks, battle to feed and protect their young in this marine environment.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - India & Sri Lanka's Deadly Mother's Day Ep4
programme.desc: Find out which creatures survive and whose luck will run out as animal mothers and moms-to-be struggle with sweltering temperatures, lurking predators, mating season, and drought on a day that proves to be no holiday.

programme.desc: The Show, a weekly variety music show from Korea's SBS Prism Tower, showcasing some of the biggest names in K-Pop, where viewers vote for The Show Choice winner and results are announced weekly.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep9
programme.desc: Turbo Drift - The snails and Tito travel to Tokyo to film a commercial and Turbo is challenged to a drift race against a beautiful and mysterious female cricket.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep9
programme.desc: Sandstorm - The Dinotrux get caught in a powerful sandstorm that stops them in their tracks, which leaves Ty Rux and the Reptools to find a way to save them.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? S2 Ep35
programme.desc: Uh-Oh, Canada - The Wanderers and Whitebeard visit Wizard Blizzardbeard in Quebec City, Canada, for the big Wanderers Ice Hockey Tournament. When Odlulu uses the Invisibility Key on herself and Fritz, they become an unstoppable, invisible hockey-playing duo. Wally and Wenda must pursue Odlulu on the rink and throughout Quebec City to retrieve the Invisibility Key.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S2 Ep35
programme.desc: Foldin' Girls / V For Ven-Lotta - Dot faces off against Chevron in the North American Origami Gam Prix. Someone ruined Lotta's elaborate pasta sculpture -- and she wants payback.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Lucky And The Super Amazing And Fun Cousin Julian - Luckys buttons are pushed when her seemingly perfect cousin Julian comes to visit but reveals himself to be a junior con man

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Lights Camera Crackridge / Karaoke Dokey - Archibald scores a job as a movie star's stunt double. Loy starts to lose it after getting a disappointing score on Archibald's karaoke video game.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Home Alone - Aggro, Burple and Cutter are left alone in the roost to care for some dragon eggs, but a trio of tricky Slinkwings want those eggs for themselves.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep35
programme.desc: Humanspeople Safari / Happy Space Troopers - Oh introduces Tip to the strange world of Boovian Earth tours; Rejected by the Junior Lady Rangers, Oh and Tip form their own all-inclusive scouts, sparking a turf war

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep9
programme.desc: Out Of The Cave And Onto Thin Ice - After a shocking revelation, Po is determined to get his chi back and Jing decides to face Jindiao

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep13
programme.desc: Rescue - Cleo and the rest go on a rescue mission to crime-ridden Hykosis City, which leads to a devastating confrontation with Octavian.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep35
programme.desc: Hitting The Sky Note / Hug Fest - When Poppy discovers that Sky Toronto doesn’t sing, she sets out to convince him that singing is the greatest joy in the world./Poppy shows Branch around his first Hug Fest, a Troll festival to celebrate hugs.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep35
programme.desc: Fast Food Lemur Nation - Tired of waiting so long for his meals, King Julien introduces “fast food” to the kingdom, but the side effects are not what he expected.

programme.title: Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants - Space Ep45
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Disturbing Dilemma Of The Dysfunctional Doppelgangers - The crew meets their blue-hued doppelgängers when they crash-land on an alien planet where kids call all the shots.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S2 Ep47
programme.desc: The Fumbling Of Football Mike - After Boss accidentally sells Tim's favorite Football Mike toy at a family yard sale, he shirks his duties as a CEO to try to get it back. But the villains pick up on his one weakness, his brother, and so begins a game of elaborate keep-away.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep9
programme.desc: Boots - Jack Sprat steals enchanted boots from the Treasure House and triggers a dangerous Devil Wind that threatens to consume San Lorenzo's treasure.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep8
programme.desc: Surf N Turf / Hardcase Returns - The snails' relaxing day at the beach is threatened when the sewer surfing roaches challenge them to a surfing contest. // Hardcase returns and threatens to take revenge on, so the crew becomes his bodyguards and takes the job a little too seriously.

programme.desc: Quake, Rattle And Roll - Fishlegs and Meatlug liberate the Gronckles from a menacing dragon that has encroached on their ancestral home, Dark Deep.

programme.desc: Creepslayerz - After Steve discovers “monsters” could be lurking under Arcadia, he allies with Eli to investigate

programme.desc: Quake, Rattle And Roll - Fishlegs and Meatlug liberate the Gronckles from a menacing dragon that has encroached on their ancestral home, Dark Deep.

programme.desc: Fast Food Lemur Nation - Tired of waiting so long for his meals, King Julien introduces “fast food” to the kingdom, but the side effects are not what he expected.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep41
programme.desc: Rupert And The Butterfly Collector - Rupert, Bill and Edward set off to look for butterflies in the wood. In particular they hope to see the rare Polka Dot Butterfly. On the way, they meet a Butterfly Collector who is also looking for the Polka Dot but - instead of just enjoying watching the butterfly - he wants to catch it in his net and keep it in a jar. The friends see it as their mission to protect the Polka Dot and let it fly free.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep42
programme.desc: Rupert And The Lost Stars - Rupert pedals his car to meet Bill and Ping Pong at the tree house where they plan to spend the night. On his way he meets Raggety who is very proud of the new lantern he has made from glowing bugs he found in the forest. Rupert invites him to sleep at the tree house but Raggety announces he is a big brave elf and wants to sleep by himself. At the tree house, Bill has a surprise for Rupert. Astra the Star Girl has come to Nutwood, but sadly she has not come to play. She dropped some new stars while she was hanging them in the sky. They have fallen down to Earth and she has followed them to Nutwood. She has to get them back in the sky before nightfall or they will miss their first moonlight and fade away forever. Ping Pong magics Rupert's car into a flying car to assist their search but there are lots of shiny things in Nutwood sending them on false trails. Evening approaches and time is running out. Meanwhile, Raggety prepares for his night alone, and discovers the glowing bugs in his lantern can talk.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep41
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Noisy Challenge - Crocky challenges Raa Raa to make a noise with everything in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. Will Raa Raa succeed?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep42
programme.desc: Catch The Page - Topsy is trying to read, but Raa Raa and the other jungle animals are all racing around making too much noise. Topsy is so upset she accidentally rips the last page from her book… can her friends set off on a noisy chase through the jungle to find it?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep15
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Bouncing Bulb - Pat's Special Delivery is a very large, very fragile lighthouse bulb, and everything seems to be conspiring to make him break it! Falling timber, an out of control sofa, Bonnie the dog, high winds...! Pat's journey from the sorting office to Pencaster Bay is a minefield of hazards. Waiting for the bulb is lighthouse keeper Chris Beacon and his pet parrot Micawber, both anxious to get the lighthouse working before sundown, and tracking a storm blowing in. Out at sea are Alf and PC Selby, enjoying a day's fishing, until they drift off-course and need the lighthouse to guide them ashore...

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep16
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Lost Pigeon - The Thompson's family pigeon, Cedric, has been reported found in Northern Ireland. Pat must take Dorothy and Bill to help bring him back in the SDS Plane. Meanwhile Alf camps out at the sorting office, pining for his beloved Cedric's return. Once in Ireland, Pat meets the man who found Cedric and Dorothy manages to charm him down from his roof. Unfortunately an inopportune phone call from Alf startles cedric and causes him to take up a roost on a cliff face with a friendly puffin. With Alf causing chaos trying "help" Ben tidy up the Sorting office in Pencaster, Pat exercises his climbing skills to retrieve Cedric but it takes a brave abseil from Dorothy and Sean to finally lure the wayward bird back to its rightful owners.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep93
programme.desc: Lovelorn Slugsy - Slugsy is having trouble courting Primrose. Stingo's cousin Hornetto offers to help him. But could he be up to no good?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep94
programme.desc: Fifi'S Snowy Fun - It has snowed in Flowertot Garden and all the tots are having fun… except Primrose who is worried she'll get dirty. Can the other tots convince her to play with them?

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep41
programme.desc: Gran Up - When Gran’s Harley gets impounded, Dennis thinks she’s lost her groove and given up on her thrill-seeking ways. In trying to help her, Dennis accidentally ages himself up into an Old Man Dennis, who teams up with Gran to prove you’re never too old to be a rebel.

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep42
programme.desc: The Tech Specs - Dennis is in the frame for a crime he didn’t commit, and Mrs Creecher’s new super-powered Tech Specs mean she can suddenly see WAY too well: she teams up with Sergeant Slipper to track down “fugitive Dennis” who has to somehow evade the all-seeing Tech Specs so he can prove his innocence and reveal the true criminal.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep47
programme.desc: Razor'S Edge - Keith and Krolia cross a new space universe in search of a powerful source of Quintessence

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep21
programme.desc: The Legends Of The Power Gems: Chapter Four - With all three elemental power gems in hand, Fearless Leader sets out to take over the world. But with every use of the gems, the world becomes more unstable, and they’re heading toward certain destruction

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep21
programme.desc: Packet Racket / Smack Me Down - When a shady group of bugs moves into the city selling artificial ketchup, Turbo and Shadow go undercover to expose who is behind the operation. // After Turbo is challenged to compete in an underground smack-talk contest, he must get lessons from the best insult snail there is, Burn.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep13
programme.desc: Night - The crew uses Lightning Bitbugs to light up the garage when Dozer needs a late-night repair, but need a new plan after Scrapadactyls attack.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep13
programme.desc: Australian Blunder Down Under - When a mother kangaroo hops away with Wally's hat on her head and Fritz in her pouch, Wally, Wenda and Odlulu must work together. They use the Talk to Animals Keys to track the runaway kangaroo through the Australian Outback.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free - Riding Academy Ep68
programme.desc: The S. S. Friend-Ship - After the PALs encourage Maricela to make new friends, she forms the exclusive "Poshy Posse" with Priya, Sahir and Alex.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep13
programme.desc: Model Behavior / Pillow Fight Club - Satin and Chenille put on a fashion show to impress the trendsetter of Troll VillagePoppy and Branch start a massive villagewide pillow battle to determine who gets the pillow of destiny.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled Ep65
programme.desc: The Day Before Tomorrow - King Julien rallies his troops and comes up with a plan for all of them to work together to destroy the mountain lemurs once and for all

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep13
programme.desc: Podlings / Dumpster Dining - Oh's family reunion ends up turning into a disastrous family Tip and Oh secretly turn Lucy's craft store into a trendy new Boovian restaurant.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep39
programme.desc: Skeleton Town - The townspeople are so terrified when Puss brings the skeleton army back to San Lorenzo that they ignore Uli's sad attempts at being evil and scary.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep39
programme.desc: Defenders Of The Wing Part 1 - The Defenders of the Wing are a local island tribe, which worships dragons and believe the Riders have stolen their protector – the Eruptodon dragon.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep14
programme.desc: Gran The Unfriendly Ghost/Bad Sandy - Gran is sick of the Croods not listening to her advice and fakes her own death. But, when the Croods don't mourn to her liking, she haunts them/Ahhh! Valley threatens to exile Sandy after a string of bad behavior unless the Croods can get her under control

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep25
programme.desc: Hard Luck Hardcase / Bee Story - Hardcase follows the crew to the desert and goes to extreme lengths attempting to finally get his revenge on Turbo. // White Shadow loses his good-luck charm and spirals into a streak of terrible luck and the crew must help him find it before things get any worse.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep26
programme.desc: Tur-Bros / The Snailman - During a visit to a racing convention Turbo is kidnapped by an overzealous fan and it's up to the rest of the FAST crew to save him. // Turbo throws a wild race for his fellow insects, but is surprised when his old nemesis, Guy Gagne, returns for a rematch.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep77
programme.desc: The End Is Near - When King Julien learns that Clover may marry Sage, he sets out to prepare the kingdom for post-Clover attacks

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep78
programme.desc: The End Is Here - When King Julien and the gang bury Sage for his bachelor party, things don't go according to plan and they must deal with Franken-Sage!

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep25
programme.desc: Peril Patch / Sibling Quibbling - When a mysterious, dangerous mini-golf course blooms in Troll Village, the Trolls must figure out how to destroy it/Satin's relationship with Chenille is tested when she befriends an extreme sports-loving Troll

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep26
programme.desc: Musical Thrones / Branch Burn - Poppy hosts the biggest contest of the year for the chance to with a cool new hug watch/The Snack Pack go on a Caterbus road-trip and get sucked into a wormhole

programme.desc: Dawn Of The Broods Part 1 & Part 2 - Grug convinces The Croods to go on vacation, and they find a new family, The Broods, who live in a solitary utopia too good to be true/The Croods must escape and warn Ahhh! Valley before it's too late.

programme.desc: Gran Day Out - When Gran moves into the cave with The Croods, she drives Grug nuts and embarrasses Eep in front of the first-ever group of cool kids.

programme.desc: Shell Shocked Part 2 - An extremely powerful new dragon attacks Dragon's Edge, and Hiccup makes a dangerous alliance while the fate of the Dragon Eye hangs in the balance.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep43
programme.desc: Rupert And The Photo Finish - RUPERT lends his TRIPOD to the TWINS to keep their camera steady. The TWINS surprise RAGGETY, who accidentally aims a spell at the CAMERA, which comes alive. Now they're playing camera tag! Except if you get flashed you end up stuck in a photo! After RAGGETY, PING PONG, MING, EDWARD and BILL are all trapped, RUPERT realises that if they all get zapped they won't be able to play again – or even get out of the photos. But RUPERT has a plan. The TWINS act as bait so he can outsmart the CAMERA with its own reflection. The CAMERA takes a photo of itself, which releases everyone, and RAGGETY gets everything back to normal with a final spell.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep44
programme.desc: Rupert Lights The Way - When the Rocky Bay lighthouse stops working Rupert and friends try to help. But what can create enough light to warn the ships away from the rocks? When he sees Ming snapping at a firefly, Rupert gets an idea....

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep43
programme.desc: Raa Raa Gets Squeaky - Raa Raa is in a particularly helpful mood and offers to help everyone take provisions for the picnic to Rockywockyville for them. But he doesn't arrive in time, everyone sets out to see what has happened to their noisy little lion friend

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep44
programme.desc: Wake Up Huffty - The animals are all looking forward to waking up early to watch the dawn chorus, but Huffty doesn't stir when the alarm goes off. Can Raa Raa and the others wake the sleeping elephant in time?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep17
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Runaway Bath - Pat must deliver an old bath tub to Pencaster Lighthouse. But when he goes to collect it from Thompson Ground, the bath ends up rolling away into Greendale with Jess inside! When Pat catches up with the bath he finds PC Selby about to impound it for being an un-road-worthy vehicle. Pat explains it's a Special Delivery and at last gets on his way. But when he arrives in Pencaster Bay, Micawber and Jess between them manage to loosen the rope tying up the SDS Boat and it goes chugging off to sea with no one on board! So Pat and Jess use the bath as a boat and paddle out to rescue the boat then at last deliver the old bath to Chris. SDS Mission accomplished - mioaw!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep18
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Loch Ness Monster - Mrs Goggins is on holiday, so Sarah Gilbertson is looking after her dog Bonnie. She calls in on Pat and proves she has zero control over the dog. But there is only time for Jess to roll his eyes before Pat is called out on a special delivery - it's urgent! He has to deliver the RADARSCOPE (designed by Ted) to Mrs Goggins, who is up in Scotland! Pat has no idea what a radarscope is and neither does Ben. But they know what urgent means, so they spring into action and load it into Pat's jet plane. Back in Greendale Bonnie gives Sarah the slip, and PC Selby becomes embroiled in an escalating search... up in Scotland meanwhile, Pat lands but doesn't even get an explanation of the radarscope as time is pressing, and he, Jess, and their technological bit of kit are bundled into a boat and they set out over the loch... Loch Ness! While the search for mischievous Bonnie intensifies back home, Pat realizes they are searching for a creature of their own - the Loch Ness Monster!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep95
programme.desc: Mystery In Flowertot Garden - Somebody has been going through the tots' bins every night in Flowertot Garden. The tots turn detective to see if they can discover who the culprit is.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep96
programme.desc: Stingo Cleans Up - Diggly has had enough of the heap of unwanted items next to his compost heap. Stingo decides to "resell" them to the other tots and unwittingly helps everybody out!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep43
programme.desc: Goodbye, Rubi Doomsday - Rubi gets a place in a Summer School for Super Smart Kids, which turns out to be a trick to exploit her technical brilliance and get her unwittingly working for WilburCorp, giving Walter the power to control clouds.

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep44
programme.desc: Pi In The Sky - The Gang spot what appears to be a meteor, through Screwtop’s mega-powerful telescope. It turns out to be an early space-invention of the Professor’s, hurtling back towards Earth, on collision course with Beanotown! Can Dennis and the gang save the day or will Beanotown be destroyed forever!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep120

programme.desc: Pup Pup Boogie / Pups in a Fog - The PAW Patrol must work quickly to fix the tracks and remove a train car at the Adventure Bay Train Station, before the next train comes. // Ryder and the PAW Patrol battle the clock to fix the lighthouse.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Paddington Meets Lucky / Paddington and the Love Day Cards - Paddington meets Mateo's dog Lucky! Paddington tries to teach him tricks, but Lucky will not behave. It's Love Day in Windsor Gardens! // Paddington is on a mission to deliver Love Day cards to all his friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Danny's Pirate Party - It is Danny Dog's birthday, and with the help of Granddad Dog and Grandpa Pig the children take part in a pirate treasure hunt.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Mr Potato Comes to Town - All the people in Peppa's town are excited to meet Mr Potato when he comes to open a new sports center.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep318

programme.desc: Pups Save a Chicken Tulip / Pups Stop an Xtreme Shark - When Mayor Humdinger and his mother help Mayor Goodway look for a rare tulip, Humdinger's attempts to have his mom find the flower first gets them all in trouble. // The Pups must save Daring Danny X when a mechanical shark stunt that goes awry.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep614
programme.desc: Pups Save a Bat Family - A rockslide traps a Bat Family inside their cave, so the Pups have to free them! The bats search for a new home leads to problems in town though!

programme.desc: Baddy Long Legs - Rammy is so focused on meditation that he fails to focus on a REAL crisis!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Paddington and the Monster Hunt - There's a monster in Paddington's room and Mrs. Bird takes him on a monster hunt.

programme.desc: Hello Bikini Bottom! - A concert promoter wants to send SpongeBob and Squidward on the road, until greedy Mr. Krabs decides to manage them—and their “world tour”—himself.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Fool's Gold / Flight Plan - When they find a treasure map, the Casagrandes go on a wild search for Pancho Villa's gold. // Frida and Carlos go on a fancy plane ride, but Carl and CJ try to sneak on for an adventure of their own.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Arr in the Family / Finders Weepers - Ronnie Anne is determined to help CJ get onstage at a Pirate Dinner Show. // Ronnie and Sid have to decide whether they "borrow" money from a lost coin purse they found in the mercado.

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Race to the Top / Meet Harl Hubbs - Fendrich and Sinclair compete to win the City's tallest building contest. // An off-screen narrator, narrates a day in the life of helpful handyman, Harl Hubbs.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Hawk Man / Jammy Good! - Parker meets Mt. Middlemost's resident daredevil, who hung up his "cape" after an extreme jump went wrong. // Ms. Pam creates a sentient jar of jam who wins the hearts and minds of all who dine at the Middlemost Toast.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep413
programme.desc: Artsy Smartsy - Theodore helps Simon to try and get past his perfectionism in order to complete an art assignment for art class.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep413
programme.desc: The Crush - Simon has a crush on the babysitter and secretly prepares a romantic dinner while Theodore keeps Alvin distracted.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep414
programme.desc: Best in Shoe - To land the lead role in a play, Alvin wagers Brittany that he can remain in character as a shoe cobbler.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep414
programme.desc: Royal Pain - When Brittany becomes convinced she's a long lost princess she carries her new royal status a little too far.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep213
programme.desc: The Getaway / Lost and Found - When SpongeBob mistakes an escaped convict for his driving instructor, it's the new teacher who learns a lesson. // When Krabs sends him searching for a missing toy, SpongeBob finds himself lost... in the lost & found!

programme.title: Danger Force S01 Ep121
programme.desc: SW.A.G is Haunted - When Ray finds out that SW.A.G. is home to an annoying ghost from the 1920's, Danger Force steps into action by helping the ghost with her unfinished business so she will stop haunting their school.

programme.title: Star Trek: Prodigy S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Masquerade - Trapped in the Neutral Zone, the crew encounters a rogue geneticist who sheds light on Dal's past.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Grandparent Trap / Miss Step - Ronnie Anne thinks her grandparent's marriage is in trouble after watching a relationship talk show. // Ronnie Anne learns the art of baile folklorico - and that her Tia Frida is one intense instructor!

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep618
programme.desc: Space Jammed / Pageant Mom - Annoyed by Leni's intrusive babysitting, Lisa accidentally blasts herself and Todd into space. // Lola tries to whip Mom into tip-top pageant condition for a Mother-Daughter pageant.

programme.title: Big Nate S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Belles A Ringin' - While buying romance novels for a heartbroken Ellen, Nate discovers they are total cash cows. Under a pen name, he writes a best-selling graphic novel using the people in his life as inspiration until it catches up to him.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S04 Ep69
programme.desc: Krusty Towers / Mrs. Puff, You're Fired - In another one of his money making schemes, Mr. Krabs turns the Krusty Krab into an upscale hotel. // Mrs. Puff gets fired when the higher ups learn of Spongebob's repeated failure.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S04 Ep70
programme.desc: Chimps Ahoy / Ghost Host - Sandy is worried her inventions won't satisfy her chimp beneficiaries. // The Flying Dutchman crashes at SpongeBob's house where he constantly scares, startles and surprises SpongeBob.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Dolores Moody / P.I.R.A.T.E. - Parker tries to cheer up the grouchiest woman on Mt. Middlemost-Dolores Moody. // Parker, Angus, and Russell must save the S.S. Steadfast from being taken by pirates.

programme.title: The Loud House S01 Ep123
programme.desc: One of the Boys / A Tattler’s Tale - Lincoln wishes he had ten brothers instead of ten sisters, and Lisa gives him a glimpse into that reality. // Lola wants to be a part of the siblings' secrets club, but they won't let her in because she's a 'tattle tale'.

programme.title: The Loud House S01 Ep126
programme.desc: Study Muffin / Homespun - Lincoln gets a tutor that all his sisters instantly get crushes on, making it impossible for Lincoln to study. // The kids complain about their house, but when a tornado threatens to destroy it, they start to feel differently.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Flee Market / Copy Can't - Bobby struggles to give up control of the mercado during his pizza-versary date with Lori. // When Ronnie Anne notices that she's the only person Carlitos won't copy, she's determined to change it!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Away Game / Monster Cash - Abuela worries that Ronnie Anne and Bobby will want to live at their Dad's new apartment instead. // Carl hosts a haunted tour based on Abuela's tale of 'El Cucuy,' and learns that it may not be fiction.

programme.title: It's Pony S01 Ep118
programme.desc: The Wallet / Locked Out - When Annie finds a lost wallet, she's determined to return it to its owner and prove she's a good person. // Annie and Pony get locked out of their building, and they can't seem to convince their neighbors to let them back in.

programme.title: It's Pony S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Always Yes Annie / Sleepover - Pony bets Annie that she can't go a whole day without saying no. // Annie is determined to go to her first sleepover, but Pony's homesickness threatens to change that.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep237
programme.desc: Goons on the Moon - Sandy takes her "Science Scout" troop on a trip to the moon. In space, no one can hear you NYAH-NYAH-NYAH-NYAH!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep238
programme.desc: Appointment TV / Karen's Virus - The long-lost episode of Mermaid Man is finally showing on TV, but will SpongeBob make it home in time to watch? // Karen gets a computer virus, and it's up to SpongeBob to get it out of her!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep239
programme.desc: The Grill is Gone / The Night Patty - When a gang of kids steals the Krusty Krab's grill, SpongeBob and Mr. Krabs go to extreme lengths to win it back. // SpongeBob helps out the Krusty Krab's night shift crew, but the customers crave something creepier than usual.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep240
programme.desc: Bubbletown / Girls' Night Out - SpongeBob visits his old pal Bubble Buddy's hometown... Bubbletown! // Sandy invites Karen and Mrs. Puff out for a night on the town, so the ladies decide to blow off some steam.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Princess & the Po - When Po is asked to bring a young princess to the King of the Qidan to make a peace offering, they learn that an agreement between the two kingdoms will come at a cost.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Chain Reaction - After the Croc Bandits steal Shifu's favorite ruby-encrusted statue of Oogway from Po and Tigress, the two warriors must team up to get the statue back and return it home.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The King of Omashu - Aang takes Katara and Sokka back to a favorite place he used to go to when he was younger, the Earth Kingdom City of Omashu. But when they break the law they are taken to the King to get their punishment.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Can't Touch This - The penguins discover the abuse that Randy the sheep gets in the children's zoo from all the children with sticky hands tugging at his wool, and decide to find him a new home.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Mort Unbound / Roomies - Mort is exposed to Kowalski's super-ray, and he grows super-big and strong. // Marlene gets a new roommate! At first, she's excited to have a new best friend. But her attitude changes when her roommate turns out to have some pretty disgusting habits.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Roger Dodger / Lemur See, Lemur Do - The rats have been terrorizing Roger the alligator. He asks the penguins for help. Their solution: swap Roger's brain with Rico's, and let the but kicking begin! // A robot is sent to the zoo to learn the habits of lemurs before it's sent into space.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep111
programme.desc: TNT-Midi / Poltergoose - SwaySway and Buhdeuce accidentally deliver Spicy Dynamite Bread to T-Midi, and now they have to fix up their mix up. // The rocket van gets possessed by a Poltergoose, who turns out to be a real pain in the beak.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep112
programme.desc: The Queen is Back - Kendar decides to give Axe to Alivn the demon so Alvin will leave them all alone. Brendar and the gang are devastated and decide to go on a quest to rescue Axe.

programme.desc: Bear Under Control/Bear Scents/In the Service of His Majesty/Kung Fu Lemmings/The Bear that Laid Golden Eggs/Sniffer Sniffler Raccoon/Grizzy the Wizard - To make sure that the Lemmings don't snatch his chocolate spread Grizzy turns the fridge into a safe. But the Lemmings see Grizzy open the door while sleepwalking.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated Ep11/Ep12
programme.desc: The Secret Serum/The Shrieking Madness - There's a vampire loose in the town -- terrorizing the residents and stealing an odd assortment of loot.

programme.title: Brave Bunnies Ep119/Ep149

programme.title: Alice & Lewis Ep34/Ep19
programme.desc: Shhh! It’S A Secret!/The Royal Teddybear - Alice is annoyed: Carole and Bastien are hiding something from her. And when she goes to Wonderland, she discovers that Lewis has a secret from her, too.

programme.desc: Big Brother Snugs/Monsterpet Badge - Snugs is about to be a big brother! But he’s nervous: does he have what it takes to be the best big brother ever?

programme.desc: Pollinia Loses Her Hearing!/An Endangered Dream – Part 2 - Pollinia’s hearing is impeded during an accident and now she can’t hear the sweet melodies of the ripe Glowing Fruits.

programme.title: Dino Ranch Ep119/Ep133
programme.desc: Sneaky Swipers/Pterodackattack! - When things begin to disappear from Dino Ranch, Blitz and the gang discover the importance of knowing the facts before jumping to conclusions.

programme.title: Ranger Rob Ep334/Ep319
programme.desc: Migration Frustration In Big Sky Park/A Lemonade Stand In Big Sky Park - Rob guides giraffes to a new watering hole.

programme.title: Lucas The Spider Ep125/Ep133
programme.desc: Egg-Scuse Me/House Flies Don't Dance - Lucas finds an egg and decides to take care of it. But he learns that responsibility is hard.

programme.desc: Wabbit's Best Friend/Daffy the Stowaway/Sir Littlechin And The Giant/Oils Well that Ends Well/King Nutininkommen/Cold Medal Wabbit/To Beach His Own - Bugs comes face to face with Jack the Dog Trainer. It's up to him to rescue a pack of dogs.

programme.title: The Looney Tunes Show Ep22/Ep32
programme.desc: Beauty School/Father Figures - Daffy finds his true passion when he tries his hand at hairdressing. Meanwhile, Porky enrolls in dance class.

programme.title: Roger Ep129/Ep130/Ep131/Ep139/Ep140/Ep134/Ep135
programme.desc: A Lovely Disintegrator/Too Much Is Too Much/Way Way Under The Volcano/Suds Fest/A Footless Race/Panic In The Lab/Down In The Dumps - Roger is sorting out all of the old spare parts from his flying saucer and stumbles on the most dangerous thing in the whole world: a galaxy disintegrator!! Meanwhile, Michel, the castaway cook is feeling a bit lonely and would like to have someone to share his very “unique” sense of humor with. He leeches onto Fatou who, in order to ditch him, offers him the disintegrator, totally oblivious to its apocalyptic capacities. Fatou and Roger and going to have to get their hands on the deadly object before it’s too late. But with Michel and his non-stop joking, Operation-rescue-the-galaxy is going to be stressful and super complicated...

programme.title: Tom And Jerry Theatricals Ep5/Ep42/Ep99/Ep107/Ep94/Ep117/Ep20/Ep57

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls Ep120/Ep162/Ep205/Ep121/Ep162
programme.desc: Bubbles of the Opera/Home, Sweet Homesick/In The Doghouse/Sister Sitter/Home, Sweet Homesick - When Bubbles gets a bad school photo, it sends her into an existential tailspin of darkness.

programme.title: Ben 10 Ep120/Ep159/Ep199/Ep221/Ep255
programme.desc: Shhh!/King Koil/Franken-Fight/Xingo Nation/Growing Up Is Hard To Do - While relaxing at a monastery with a no-noise policy, Ben can't keEp.quiet and accidentally awakens a dangerous dragon hidden in a secret chamber below the hallowed halls.

programme.title: Foster's Home For Imaginary Friends Ep19/Ep7
programme.desc: Frankie My Dear/Store Wars - Mac and Bloo develop crushes on Frankie and compete for her love.

programme.title: Roger Ep136/Ep137/Ep138/Ep146/Ep147/Ep141/Ep149
programme.desc: Not-So-Remote-Control/Moving Out Moving In/Us Vs. Them/Only Two More Minutes/Sani-Mutator 325/Fatou, The Stunt Girl/A Slight Misunderstanding - A rollicking TV session with Roger and Fatou fighting over the remote. Fatou finally wins in the end, after all, this is her house so it’s HER remote control and it is SHE who shall decide what they watch on TV. Roger decides to build a super-duper powerful remote control that will allow him to take total control of the TV. They get into another fight and this time, Roger’s remote control goes all haywire. Our heroes suddenly discover that not only does it control the TV, but living beings as well! Pause, rewind, fast-forward, mute... Whoa! And although they promise each other that they will never fight again, equipped with this new super power toy, it’s a pandora’s box of problems ahead...
