programme.title: Citra Kemakmuran Negara (New)
programme.desc: Citra Kemakmuran Negara adalah program khas yang menceritakan konsep sesebuah negara dan bagaimana pemerintahan di Malaysia iaitu Raja Berpelembagaan dan Demokrasi Berparlimen dilaksanakan. Malaysia mempunyai Institusi Majlis Raja-Raja Melayu dan tiga badan utama (Eksekutif, Perundangan dan Kehakiman) dalam memelihara kedaulatan rakyat dan membawa hala tuju negara.

programme.title: Kuasa Rakyat: Dimensi Demokrasi (New)
programme.desc: Program khas sempena PRU-15 ini menceritakan bagaimana proses pilihan raya dilakukan di Malaysia, dengan tiga prinsip utama. Melalui pilihan raya, rakyat sesebuah negara diberi kebebasan untuk memilih siapa yang akan mewakili mereka atau dalam erti kata lain memegang mandat kuasa di dalam urusan penggubalan undang-undang di institusi tertinggi negara kelak.

programme.desc: Costa plants potatoes in pots; Jane visits an Eremophila expert; Tino meets migrant gardeners; Sophie plants for pollinators; Josh reclaims a garden bed; and we meet a colourful collage artist.

programme.title: Landline Ep41
programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep44
programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters across the country uncover the news and unique stories about what's going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: ABC News Ep94
programme.desc: Miriam Corowa presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: Offsiders Ep46
programme.desc: Kelli Underwood and the panel discuss the Kangaroos v Samoa in the Rugby League World Cup Final, the Wallabies v Ireland, the AFLW Preliminary Finals plus the final countdown to the FIFA World Cup in Qatar.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show S2 Ep25
programme.desc: Sera Naiqama, Sam Wykes and former Wallaby Mark Gerrard round up the Rugby League and Union World Cup results. Plus Sam takes a very special trip back to his Tongan village.

programme.title: Kurt Fearnley's One Plus One - Megan Davis Ep7
programme.desc: Megan Davis is widely considered one of the architects of the Uluru Statement from the Heart. One of the driving forces behind an Indigenous Voice to Parliament, Megan talks about fairness, recognition and rugby league.

programme.title: ABC News With Auslan Ep53
programme.desc: The latest news and information from ABC News. This bulletin will be Auslan interpreted to provide accessible information to keep Australia's deaf community connected and informed. Presented by Miriam Corowa.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep44
programme.desc: Beverley O'Connor presents the week's main international news, as reported by ABC News correspondents deployed in Bangkok, Beirut, Istanbul, Jakarta, Jerusalem, London, New Delhi, Port Moresby, Taipei, Tokyo and Washington.

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep94
programme.desc: Live across Australia, the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and live coverage of events as they unfold. Plus comprehensive analysis, context and original investigations from ABC reporters around the world.

programme.title: Compass - Sacred Space: Jack Beetson S36 Ep12
programme.desc: Geraldine Doogue meets Ngemba man Prof Jack Beetson - one of the first Aboriginal Australians to complete a university degree in adult education. Jack has served as a vanguard for education initiatives throughout Australia.

programme.title: ABC News Sunday Ep47
programme.desc: Gemma Veness presents the latest from ABC News, covering today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and updated news from all corners of Australia and around the globe.

programme.title: A Girl's Guide To Hunting, Fishing And Wild Cooking S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Analiese makes the most of Spring by building a kitchen garden with the help of Californian organic garden guru Tony Scherer. She also goes diving for wild scallops with local seafarers Chris and Mikey at a secret spot.

programme.title: Back Roads - King Island, TAS S8 Ep16
programme.desc: Heather Ewart heads to King Island, in Bass Strait half-way between Tasmania and Victoria. A place famous for cheese, seafood and the treacherous Roaring 40's winds, she finds out why many who've left are coming back. (Final)

programme.title: Inside Central Station S1 Ep7
programme.desc: For train spotters Phil and Paul, the relaunch of the most famous steam train of all, the 3801 is an event not to be missed. The ongoing battle with graffiti costs Sydney Trains $38 million each year and puts lives at risk.

programme.title: Life On The Outside S1 Ep3
programme.desc: A rollercoaster of setbacks and achievements play out as Jeremy, Sierra and Dane head towards their 100th day with each household and the watchful eye of authority still threatens their freedom.

programme.desc: With its splendid branches and white plum blossoms, this famous painting is known for captivating Van Gogh. Discover why people were able to tell this was a specific tree at Kameido Umeyashiki.

programme.title: Sumopedia

programme.title: Japan's Top Inventions(28Min.)

programme.title: Bosai: Tornadoes
programme.desc: Tornadoes are difficult to predict, striking without warning and causing tremendous damage. In this episode, we'll take a closer look at how new radar and the latest research may help save lives.

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Lewis vs. Spivac
programme.desc: Prelims - After quietly working his way up the heavyweight ranks, Moldova’s Serghei Spivac smashed his way into the Top 15 with finishes of Greg Hardy and Augusto Sakai, and now the “Polar Bear” aims for even greater heights when he faces the UFC’s Knockout King, Derrick Lewis, in the main event of UFC Fight Night on November 20 at the APEX in Las Vegas. One of the best heavyweights of his era, Lewis has sent topprospects like Chris Daukaus and Curtis Blaydes crashing to defeat, and he has similar plans for Spivac in this pivotal showdown.
